programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Frank becomes jealous when Marco begins spending time with Marie, and insists they end their friendship. His actions get the backing of Ray, who does not approve of married women having male pals - especially not his mother. Starring Ray Romano and Peter Boyle.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray loses his wedding ring and is propositioned by an attractive woman at the airport, so a jealous Debra decides to get her own back - with disastrous results. Ray Romano and Patricia Heaton star.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles's expensive divorce leaves him penniless, forcing him to move into Frasier and Martin's apartment. Comedy, starring David Hyde Pierce and Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: The Seal Who Came to Dinner.
programme.desc: Niles and Frasier prepare for a dinner party at Maris's beach house, but a bizarre turn of events results in them having to devote all their time to disposing of a dead seal that has washed up on the shore.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Unemployed Roz is reduced to borrowing money from Frasier, but he thinks she is spending it irresponsibly. Meanwhile, rumours circulate that KACL is rehiring staff. Comedy, starring Peri Gilpin and Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Brooklyn, New York, to tackle a 55-year-old family business. Owner John Esposito left school at the age of 14 and has worked at his parents' restaurant, Sal's Pizzeria, ever since. Their success meant they could afford to purchase the location next door in the 1990s, naming it Mama Maria after John's mother, who died in 2002. But when he lost his father as well, John became overwhelmed by the responsibility of running both establishments and his livelihood is at risk.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Ever since Jacqueline Priddin's parents moved to the Costa del Sol, she and husband Anthony have dreamt of also buying a place there for them and their daughter Izzy. Now they have decided to make that happen, so Ben Hillman shows them five homes in the inland area west of Malaga that suit their £50,000 budget. But will it be a town house or a rustic finca that wins them over?.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from Greater Manchester compete to win the £1,000 prize, including Amy and Matt, who kick off the competition with a varied menu that causes chaos in their kitchen. The second dinner party of the week sees Paula and Andy prepare a selection of family favourites, but Sharon's husband Simon raises a few eyebrows when he makes a frank admission at the dinner table.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Sheffield pawnbroker Dan Hatfield and his team try to do a deal on a set of rare commemorative stamps signed by legendary astronaut Buzz Aldrin, an upcycled burger van and a huge diamond ring. In Kent, pawnbroking brothers Charlie and Patrick Devine check out an antique dentist chair, while a possible deal on an £18,000 beach hut is enough to get Charlie on a trip to the seaside.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer wins a vintage motorcycle and forms his own gang - only to encounter trouble in the form of tough bikers the Hell's Satans, who kidnap Marge. Featuring the voices of John Goodman and Henry Winkler.(n)

James also values a tiara belonging to a martial arts fan, which could be worth £40,000.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker are joined by comedian and presenter Sue Perkins for a comic review of the significant moments of the past seven days, with a special focus on the General Election. The quartet offer their own unique insight into some of the most difficult and delicate issues in modern Britain, and answer that most important of questions: is it OK?.(n)

programme.title: The Fake News Show
programme.desc: Stephen Mangan hosts the comedy panel show, with team captains Katherine Ryan and Richard Osman joined by guest captain Richard Ayoade, Rhod Gilbert, Gogglebox's Steph and Dom Parker, and political scientist Professor John Curtice to determine the truth being hidden by fake news, dissecting outlandish headlines, alternative facts, digitally altered photographs and all-too-believable viral clips.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Richard Osman, Ellie Taylor, Jessica Knappett, David O'Doherty, Rob Beckett and Aisling Bea answer questions based on opinion polls carried out around the country to see who best understands what is going on in Britain today. Jimmy Carr hosts.(n)

programme.title: Sarah Millican - Home Bird Live
programme.desc: Stand-up show recorded in 2014 at Newcastle's Tyne Theatre & Opera House, in which the comedienne shares humorous insights into her life, including the need to put down some roots now she has cats. Plus, she offers advice on what to take away on a dirty weekend, how to teach a pensioner to swear and the correct number of meals to consume in a day.(n)

programme.title: Welcome to the Punch
programme.desc: A criminal evades the law after a heist and goes into hiding overseas, leaving the detective on his trail tormented by his failure. He gets a second chance when the crook returns to visit his hospitalised son, but the investigation brings to light a conspiracy that threatens both men. Crime thriller, starring James McAvoy, Mark Strong, Andrea Riseborough and David Morrissey.(n)

programme.title: The Handmaid's Tale
programme.desc: Dystopian drama based on Margaret Atwood's novel about a future American theocracy, in which declining birth rates have led to a new social order, where the few remaining fertile women are kept as slaves to carry children for the regime's leaders. Elisabeth Moss stars as one of these women, who struggles to cope with her repressive existence and the resentment of her owner's wife.(n)

programme.title: Shipping Wars UK
programme.desc: Rolf and Rachel suffer some directional problems and decide to go against their satnav in the hopes of finding the wrestling ring drop-off location on their own. Meanwhile, Stu and Jemma attract a crowd when they stop traffic on a one-way street in central London, and Russell comes up with a plan for unloading the military vehicles.(n)

programme.title: Kirstie's Handmade Treasures

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: A friendly woman comes to Frasier's rescue when he's out Christmas shopping. He offers to return the favour, but the last thing he expects is to end up on a blind date with her daughter - while pretending to be Jewish. Meanwhile, Niles takes part in a festive pageant.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: A series of good deeds backfires, embroiling Frasier in a humiliating scandal and causing him to question his faith in human nature. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Roz helps Frasier arrange a date between her mother and his father, unaware they detest each other. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and Peri Gilpin.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj is upset after Lucy runs away in the middle of their date, leaving the gang to cheer him up. However, when Howard bumps into her, she admits she is incredibly shy. Meanwhile, Sheldon asks Penny to help with a new episode of Fun with Flags, and because he is impressed by her acting ability, the friends go to see her in a performance of A Streetcar Named Desire.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: While the girls go to Disneyland and get made up as princesses, the guys have to promote science as a career option for women at Howard's old middle school. Meanwhile, Raj and Lucy have their first date in a library, where instead of speaking to each other they send text messages.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Bernadette and Howard host a dinner party, but as it falls on Sheldon's Thai food night, he opts to bring his own dinner. As punishment for his lack of manners, the gang decides he should organise Wolowitz's cluttered wardrobe, but he discovers an unopened letter from Howard's father, who hasn't made contact in years.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: German businessmen buy the nuclear power plant from Mr Burns and make sweeping changes - starting by sacking Homer, whose laziness and ineptitude are at odds with their reputation for efficiency.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart uses a radio transmitter to trick the townsfolk of Springfield into thinking a child has fallen down a disused well. As events get out of hand, he is forced to own up and face the music - but has difficulty making amends. Featuring the guest voice of Sting.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa begins to feel increasingly neglected by Homer and tries to worm her way into his affections by feigning an interest in American football. Amazingly, she soon shows an aptitude for predicting the outcome of games - an ability that sets him off on an amazing but ill-fated run of betting success.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Sports fanatic James Cox hosts the first of the week's dinner parties in Northampton, and he is confident that his French-Italian menu will bag him the £1,000 prize. However, some of his guests - Barb Wiles, Donna Harris, Duncan Fielding and Caroline Nash - are left confused by his Vichyssoise soup starter, and the tiramisu causes one of them to choke.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Mother-of-three Donna Harris hosts the second dinner party in Northampton, and hopes that three courses of pure comfort-food will be enough to secure the £1,000 prize. Donna spends almost as much time fixing her make-up as she does preparing the meal, and when guests Duncan Fielding and Caroline Nash discover a secret stash of football shirts, they realise there is more to their hostess than meets the eye.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Part-time actress Caroline Nash is the host on day three of the competition in Northampton, and she hopes that a menu based on her travels will dazzle her guests. However, the night gets off to a shaky start as Donna Harris finds a hair on the side of her goat's cheese salad, while businessman Duncan Fielding seems more interested in goats themselves than the food.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Party-loving Barb Wiles hosts the fourth dinner party in the Northampton area, and hopes her Australian-themed menu will wow her guests and win her the £1,000 prize. However, the competitors are unnerved by her interest in extraterrestrials while snooping around her bedroom, and things go from bad to worse when a seafood starter and undercooked chicken result in tears at the dinner table.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Attention-loving businessman and keen cricketer Duncan Fielding takes centre stage in hosting the final dinner party from Northampton. He creates a menu based on the story of his life - which is full of surprises and full of spice - but it proves a challenge for three of his guests, who like their food mild. His main feature is a chicken and reindeer curry, and the table is impressed to discover that he runs a community pub from the bottom of his garden.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Lee and Lynn Fox from South Yorkshire have been regular visitors to the Tuscan city of Lucca since Lee's job as a mechanical engineer first took him there over 10 years ago. Lynn's hairdressing business and Lee's job keep the couple very busy, so making the most of their quality time together is key. Laura Hamilton makes it her mission to show them a variety of properties as close to the city centre as possible, on a budget of £170,000.(n)

programme.title: Big House, Little House
programme.desc: A Somerset couple plan to use a £70,000 budget to construct the `kitchen to end all kitchens', while their counterparts in the Little House aim to build a kitchen-diner for £4,000.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: The East Midlands is the focus of this week's house-hunting, as Kirstie Allsopp joins Sam and Becky, who have a £100,000 budget and are looking for a house in Nottingham with a sizeable plot of land. Phil Spencer is with Nigel and Jane, who sold their home in Australia and moved back to the UK when Nigel was diagnosed with early onset dementia. But despite being back for months, they have struggled to find a property that lives up to expectations.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Party Election Broadcast
programme.desc: An election broadcast by one of the political parties.(n)

programme.title: The Restoration Man
programme.desc: George Clarke returns to Harrogate, North Yorkshire, to check on the progress of Carol and Majid Nadry, who after 25 years living in a bungalow, embarked on an ambitious midlife adventure - buying a water tower to turn into a five-storey home. After huge delays and eye-watering legal costs, the couple have finally built the two-storey extension that was the key to creating a family home with character. George sees how the industrial heritage of this unique building is beautifully complemented by a 21st-century glass and sheet-metal extension that finally realises the old water tower's hidden potential.(n)

programme.title: Britain's Ancient Tracks with Tony Robinson
programme.desc: The historian explores the UK's network of ancient trackways and roads, which have been walked by pilgrims, hunters and invaders over the course of the past 5,000 years, each one shrouded in myth, mystery and legend. In the first episode, Tony delves into the stories, songs and sacred places along the Icknield Way in Norfolk and Cambridgeshire.(n)

programme.title: Legend
programme.desc: Premiere. Biopic of the Kray brothers, exploring their rise to power in the London underworld and conflicts with rival gangs from the point of view of Reggie's wife Frances, who remains devoted to her husband even as he remains equally bound to his brutal, unstable sibling. Starring Tom Hardy as both twins, with Emily Browning, Christopher Eccleston and David Thewlis.(n)

programme.title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
programme.desc: The deputy to the head of British intelligence is forced into retirement after an operation ends in disaster. He is later recruited by the government to return to duty and investigate the possibility of a Soviet mole in a high-ranking position in MI6. Cold War thriller based on John Le Carre's novel, with Gary Oldman, Colin Firth, Tom Hardy, John Hurt, Benedict Cumberbatch and Roger Lloyd Pack.(n)

programme.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
programme.desc: Lily and Bull leave a gate open while playing chase, and all the sheep create havoc after wandering out of the field.(n)

programme.desc: A fallen apple inspires Mofy to write a song, but she is having trouble finishing it. When Kerry invites her to his house for tea, she hopes he can help.(n)

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi visits the Harrogate Motel in North Yorkshire, where the owners are deliberately not telling their guests that the establishment is situated in the middle of a muddy equine centre. Mother and son duo Jennifer and Drew Birtwistle are horse lovers first and hoteliers second, but despite providing five-star accommodation for horses, the bedrooms are leaving the guests far from happy. Alex steps in and demands the owners start being more upfront about what they are offering, and tries to turn the horse-loving hosts into hospitality pros.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: In Essex, Del and Dael try to collect nearly £3,000 owed by an Indian takeaway, but tempers flare when they threaten to seize kitchen equipment. Meanwhile, Paul and Steve evict a tenant who is £14,000 in rent arrears, and in Surrey, Del and Dael chase nearly £4,000 owed by a car dealer to a dissatisfied customer. Finally, in west London, two agents face one of their trickiest evictions to date, with their arrival at a young couple's flat coming as a shock.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Roo introduces James to everyone at Olivia's birthday party, but it transpires later that he took the shot of John that accompanied a disparaging feature in the day's Coastal News.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Toadie's fears escalate after receiving a disturbing letter from Sonya, Aaron suffers a crisis of confidence, and Ben investigates to see how trustworthy Finn really is.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The officers race against time to track down a highly specialised hit squad that has murdered an agent on assignment in Cyprus, desperate to intervene before a second target is killed. Crime drama, starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.(n)

programme.title: Justice for Natalee Holloway
programme.desc: A mother trying to find out what became of her missing daughter receives a message from the last man to see her alive, offering to sell the location of her body. She helps the FBI to track him down, only to realise that he may be responsible for a murder that occurred on the anniversary of the disappearance. Fact-based crime drama sequel, starring Tracy Pollan and Stephen Amell.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Toadie's fears escalate after receiving a disturbing letter from Sonya, Aaron suffers a crisis of confidence, and Ben investigates to see how trustworthy Finn really is.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Roo introduces James to everyone at Olivia's birthday party, but it transpires later that he took the shot of John that accompanied a disparaging feature in the day's Coastal News.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Party Election Broadcast
programme.sub-title: Party Election Broadcast: The Liberal Democrats: 02/06/2017.
programme.desc: By the Liberal Democrats.(n)

programme.title: The Gadget Show
programme.desc: The time has arrived for Georgie Barrat to see how far Monkey Tree FC have come from avoiding relegation, as she finds out which tech worked best - as well as deliver one final push. Jon Bentley pits the Amazon Echo against the Google Home to see how they match up to being a music player, personal assistant and home automation controller. In London, Ortis Deley gets the lowdown at the world's best virtual reality show. As well as the latest consumer gadgets, he visits a series of VR worlds that show how advanced technology will be used in the not-so-distant future.(n)

programme.title: The Great Fire
programme.sub-title: The Great Fire: A City Rebuilt.
programme.desc: The final episode follows the last day of the Great Fire's rampage through the city of London, and the after-effects that changed the capital city for ever. The team investigate the treatment for burns victims, and how authorities dealt with the 100,000 refugees made homeless. Finally, they walk through some of the streets where the fire's impact still endures, and look at how London was rebuilt from the ashes. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Long-Haul Flight
programme.desc: Documentary following one of the planet's longest flights - from London to Sydney - aboard one of the world's biggest planes, the double-decker Airbus A380. Filmed before, during and after the flight, it features the confessions of the cabin crew, the secret areas of the plane that are off-limits to passengers, and the technological wizardry that allows each aircraft to be monitored for every second of its 11,000-mile journey. Food is cooked, delivered and prepared at 40,000 feet, while a vast army of people runs the cargo, loads the animals and services the aircraft - all against the clock.(n)

programme.title: Hijacked
programme.desc: In June 1985, TWA flight 847 made a routine stop-off in Athens, Greece. Its destination was Rome, but that changed after armed Lebanese militia boarded the plane. Against the backdrop of the Middle East conflict, the terrorists had one objective in mind - the release of hundreds of Islamic prisoners detained in Israel. Seizing the US airliner shortly after take-off, the passengers and crew - including singer Demis Roussos - endured a three-day ordeal involving a stream of landings across various airports. This documentary recalls their experiences.(n)

programme.title: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. The programme reveals how essential surveillance cameras have become in the fight against crime and also features footage of reckless and dangerous drivers.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Spies Like Us
programme.desc: Two incompetent US State Department officials are unwittingly used as decoys on a deadly mission to thwart Soviet activity in Pakistan. Unfortunately, their involvement in such a delicate operation brings the world to the brink of nuclear war. Comedy, starring Chevy Chase, Dan Aykroyd, Steve Forrest, Bruce Davison and Donna Dixon.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Ann Maurice and Alistair Appleton look back on more highlights. They recall a basement flat in Stoke Newington, north London, that was putting off potential buyers because of its dark rooms, out-of-date fixtures and general messiness, and remember a cramped cottage in Quorn, Leicestershire. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Divine Designs
programme.desc: Dr Paul Binski chronicles the development of religious architecture during the 16th and 17th centuries. He contrasts the ornate splendour of the chapel at King's College, Cambridge, with the simplicity of post-Reformation churches.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Pip Ahoy
programme.desc: Aubrey the snail is upset when his dad wants him to become a footballer, as all he wants to do is dance - so Pip and Alba arrange for him to show his dancing skills during a match.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: The inquisitive puppet climbs aboard a special bus, and sets off on a tour to learn more about the world.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Bop Box
programme.desc: Kemi Majeks and Jen Pringle pretend to wobble like jellies on a plate and perform their own inimitable boogie-woogie bop.(n)

programme.title: The Mr Men Show
programme.desc: Mr Quiet trims his hedges and Mr Rude rakes leaves.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Granny Pig shows Peppa and George her poultry, and something makes a meal of Grandpa Pig's lettuces.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: The little girl helps Hayley the harvest mouse move after her mother objects to her living at their house. However, it transpires that Hayley's new neighbour is blocking her view. Animation following the adventures of a little girl who can talk to animals.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups and the Trouble with Turtles.
programme.desc: Lots of baby turtles cause chaos when they appear all over town. Ryder and the pups must gather them up and take them back to their pond.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and his crew build a special area to celebrate local heroes and Mayor Madison has to decide who will be the first recipient of a golden star.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Norman builds a go-kart, but forgets to add any brakes and finishes up in the sea.(n)

programme.title: Olly the Little White Van
programme.desc: Olly and Stan compete with Bazza as they set up rival bus services. Meanwhile, Ned and Meg want to go to the seaside.(n)

programme.title: Olly the Little White Van
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Bumpton Ghost.
programme.desc: The friends investigate sightings of a mysterious figure which is baffling Bumpton - and could be linked to Jethro's nocturnal activities.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Farmer Yumi trains the pups in the secret art of `Pup-Fu', so they can help him reclaim an ancient martial arts scroll stolen by Mayor Humdinger's Kit-tastrophe crew.(n)

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze tries to work out who stole his trophy.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Toyland Mischief Maker.
programme.desc: Big Ears' teapot goes missing and Noddy is surprised to find it hanging from a lamp post. When Bumpy's kennel goes missing too, the little wooden boy needs to investigate before Toyland descends into chaos.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Stripes the Tiger is upset when her teeth turn purple and she asks Wissper for her help.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: When Gaston goes missing, Nanny Plum uses her magic crystal ball to retrace his steps.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Leah and her genies find themselves trapped inside a cave.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.sub-title: I Want to Be a Policeman.
programme.desc: The youngster dislikes rules and decides that if she has to follow them, everyone else in the castle should too.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle tries to teach each of the youngsters in Peppa's playgroup a special skill.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The family go to the museum to see an exhibition about the moon.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but has trouble understanding the children's rules.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Lucy and her dad find an old mirror and decide to keep it, but they are unaware that it belongs to a mermaid called Princess Oceana - and she wants it back.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Donatello is feeling inferior to the Fugitoid, but his intellect is put to the test when the Triceratons attack.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.sub-title: Pets Make You Laugh Out Loud.
programme.desc: Dave Spikey and Zoe Lyons introduce another compilation of internet videos, with this edition featuring stir-crazy hamsters, tortoises with attitude problems, foul-mouthed parrots and a water-skiing squirrel. There are also clips of a pet pig that is an Instagram star, and a cat who caused an online sensation when its owner discovered its nose worked as a remote control for the bedside lamp.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: The programme returns with cameras once again following a high-speed police interception unit at work in Durham and Cleveland. Andy Lawson is involved in a high-speed chase through a housing estate, Kev Salter carries out an early morning raid on a suspected drug dealer's house and a drunk driver is grumpy when pulled over, then irate when he is arrested.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Rick Edwards joins Durham and Cleveland's dedicated team of enforcers as they hunt down, stop and lock-up anyone breaking the rules of the road, with Kev Salter showing him how to spot a drunk driver, before the presenter rides shotgun on an interceptor night shift. Plus, Paul `Jacko' Jackson collars a boozed-up driver and chases down an all-terrain tearaway.(n)

programme.title: Benefits Britain: Life on the Dole
programme.desc: This week's edition examines life on the dole in Scotland, including aspiring pop stars Zedd and Saffire, who live in Portobello, Edinburgh and receive £17,000 a year in benefits. After a failed attempt to start her own business in Australia, Kit is back in her home town of Wishaw, North Lanarkshire, to sign on and stay with friends, while Stirling resident Kirsty is desperate for work and is convinced her weight and mild learning disability are stopping her from getting a job. The 30-year-old's stay-at-home parents Rosie and Desmond believe that discrimination is to blame.(n)

programme.title: Benefits Britain: Life on the Dole
programme.desc: People who have had their benefits cut or withheld since tougher sanctions began in October 2012, including Terry, whose payments were stopped after his partner clocked up more than 24 hours in one week in her job as a care worker. Other people featured include an aspiring rapper left with £3 a day to live on, a single mother-of-three who blames her jobless state on being overweight, and a former stripper who decides to move to Spain when he is threatened with being reassessed.(n)

programme.title: Benefits Britain: Life on the Dole
programme.desc: The second of a two-part special of the programme that examines the lives of people on benefits, focusing on those who have large families. Tom and Stacey claim more than £70,000 a year from the state to support themselves and their 14 children, and run their household with military precision.(n)

programme.title: The Nightmare Neighbour Next Door
programme.desc: A man is subjected to a campaign of terror after complaining when his neighbours stole part of his land by erecting a fence in the garden. Junk mail, vicious allegations and slashed tyres become regular occurences, until a late-night raid on his home is caught on video. In Lincolnshire, a firm friendship turns sour when one resident suspects her neighbours are taking advantage of her kindness. Plus, a bitter residential dispute that begins when a woman's complaints about an old friend's son result in him being sent to jail.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Gareth and Craig investigate a possible case of mistaken identity in Shropshire, then in south Wales find themselves embroiled in a bitter dispute between two dog owners over a vet's bill. Steve and Phil have to evict a distraught young family from a former high street bank in west London, before paying a call on an elderly tailor in north London.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Officers chase £4,500 in court fees in North Wales after a property deal turned sour, and in Birmingham the agents try to collect over £3,500 from a single mum who defaulted on loan repayments. Elsewhere in Worcestershire, the enforcement agents try to recover more than £10,000 from a shop-keeper for fraudulently keeping a deposit during a property sale.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Chameleon's planted clues lead the team on a wild goose chase as it searches for NSA agent Mike Atley, who the criminal claims to have in his custody. Callen is faced with a difficult decision when he is told to release the Chameleon in order to save Atley's life, and contemplates subduing his nemesis once and for all. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Ziva's family farm in Israel is devastated by an explosion, and the former NCIS agent is reported dead. Determined to seek justice, Tony ignores orders to stay off the case and sets out to track down Trent Kort, the British national and ex-CIA agent who remains the prime suspect. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Most Shocking Celebrity Moments
programme.sub-title: Most Shocking Celebrity Moments of the 90s.
programme.desc: A countdown of infamous incidents from the 1990s, including Hugh Grant's arrest and OJ Simpson's murder trial. The programme also looks back at Eric Cantona kicking a fan during a match, Jarvis Cocker interrupting Michael Jackson's performance at the Brit awards, and David and Victoria Beckham's lavish wedding. Featuring contributions from Louis Walsh, Shaun Ryder, Bez, Michael Burke, Darren Day, Gail Porter, Tim Vincent, Liz McClarnon and Kerry Katona.(n)

programme.title: The Astronaut's Wife
programme.desc: Returning from a routine mission to repair a satellite, astronaut Spencer Armacost briefly loses radio contact with mission control. Spencer lands safely back on Earth, but as time passes his wife's anxiety grows - her husband seems somehow different since his return. And what are the implications for the twins she is now carrying?(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: Taut drama about an ambitious young stockbroker who is seduced by money and power when he hooks up with a high-powered company trader. But he faces a crisis of conscience when he discovers the truth behind the trader's bid to buy up an airline for which his father is a union rep. Michael Douglas won an Oscar for Best Actor for his portrayal of Gordon Gekko - the personification of 80s greed(n)

programme.title: The Darkness
programme.desc: During a family camping trip at the Grand Canyon, a young boy (David Mazouz) stumbles upon an ancient Native American burial ground. He takes five sacred stones from there back to his suburban home, unaware that they contain a malevolent supernatural force. This tale of terror was directed by Wolf Creek's Greg McLean. Kevin Bacon, Radha Mitchell, and Lucy Fry star in a Blumhouse Productions film(n)

programme.title: Glory Road
programme.desc: Basketball coach Dan Haskins recruits a team of predominantly black players to play for his team in racially segregated and football-mad Texas. They must overcome the many challenges that face them if they are to prove victorious against Division I favourites Kentucky(n)

programme.title: Stir of Echoes
programme.desc: Tom Witzky is a regular guy whose life is turned upside down after he is hypnotised by his sister-in-law. Suddenly, his ordinary life is invaded with violent flashes of horrific images he cannot explain(n)

programme.title: Species II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi blockbuster. After becoming the first person on Mars, astronaut Patrick Ross is infected with spores of alien DNA, resulting in a dangerously inflamed libido and an outbreak of alien offspring. Elsewhere, the monster who wreaked havoc in the original film has been cloned and united with government assassins in order to track down Ross and eliminate the new species(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Mark Steven Johnson's violent superhero fantasy-morality play stars Ben Affleck as Matt Murdock, a guilt-wracked blind vigilante with a penchant for red leather. During his childhood, an accident involving toxic waste blinded Murdock, but it also enhanced his other senses and gave him a kind of 'radar vision'. The incident was partially caused by his discovery that his father was involved with the Mob. Now, the adult Murdock, spurred partly by Catholic guilt over his role in his father's death, has dedicated this life to fighting crime and protecting the innocent. By day Murdock's a defence lawyer, but by night he dispenses summary justice to criminals who've escaped the courts. Things get complicated when he falls in love with Elektra Natchios (Jennifer Garner). Not only is she the daughter of a man with connections to New York crime bosses but, unknown to Murdock, she's also a vigilante who's equally keen on figure-hugging leather (black in her case). And when Daredevil is framed for the murder of her father, Elektra swears vengeance on the masked crime-fighter (not realising that he's her lover). Meanwhile, both of them are in mortal danger from the actual killer, a merciless Irish assassin called Bullseye (Colin Farrell)(n)

programme.title: Heartbreak Ridge
programme.desc: Sergeant Tom Highway, a hardened, tough veteran of Korea and Vietnam returns to the United States for his last tour of duty with the U.S Marine Corps. He is assigned to training a reconaissance unit(n)

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: The first major battle of the Vietnam War in 1965, and the soldiers who were involved, are depicted in this drama(n)

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: To clear his criminal record a former LA cop must infiltrate the Miami street racing scene to set up a drug baron. Burning rubber all over the city with his ex-con friend, he attempts to deliver the crook to the FBI without crashing and being blown to pieces in one of the many explosions(n)

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul (Ethan Hawke), headed to Mexico with his faithful collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. There, he brawls with a rowdy gang of misfits and finds himself exiled by the town marshal (John Travolta), which sparks a bloody quest for revenge. Karen Gillan and Taissa Farmiga co-star. Ti West wrote and directed this Western thriller(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: In the third and equally fun entry in the popular pulp-adventure series, Rick O'Connell (Brendan Fraser) and wife, Evelyn (Maria Bello), find themselves in 1940s China with their now-adult son, Alex (Luke Ford), and, of course, a troublesome mummy. This time he's a centuries-old Chinese emperor (Jet Li) with a vast undead army. Michelle Yeoh, Jonathan Carnahan, Zi Juan(n)

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: Set in the Depression of the '30s in southern United States, this drama portrays the remarkable relationship established between Paul Edgecomb (Tom Hanks), a prison guard on Death Row, and John Coffey (Michael Clarke Duncan), a hefty colored man sentenced to death for a brutal double homicide. As the days go by, and after some surprising experiences, Edgecomb begins to have doubts about Coffey's culpability. He is a naïve, apprehensive man with a supernatural gift. Based on a novel by Stephen King, this drama received four Oscar nominations(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: When war veteran Colonel Terry Childers is hung out to dry by military chiefs, he turns to an old friend, army lawyer Colonel Hayes Hodges. Drama(n)

programme.title: Francisco: el Padre Jorge
programme.desc: A journalist recalls memories of her friend Jorge Mario Bergoglio, the man who would later be known as Pope Francis(n)

programme.title: Sgt. Bilko
programme.desc: Steve Martin steps into Phil Silver's shoes for this big-screen version of the classic TV comedy. Bilko's past catches up with him when his old nemesis turns up at the base. Dir: Jonathan Lynn(n)

programme.title: Sweet November
programme.desc: Romantic melodrama about a young woman who begins a new relationship with a different man each month in order to help them develop into more compassionate individuals. However, there are unexpected repercussions for both parties when she attempts to bring meaning to the life of a hard-hearted, career-centred business executive(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Buckle up for a wild ride as Paul Walker ("Joy Ride") and Vin Diesel ("Pitch Black") put the pedal to the metal in this high-octane action thriller. Diesel plays the leader of a gang of L.A. street racers who moonlight in highway robbery; Walker is the undercover cop who befriends him. Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster, Rick Yune, Chad Lindberg(n)

programme.title: El Hueco
programme.desc: A man who has been planning to buy the cemetery plot alongside that of his long-time love discovers it has been sold to someone else, and that's when the plot thickens(n)

programme.title: Permitidos
programme.desc: A couple joke about getting a one-time pass for a night of infidelity with their favorite celebrity, but they must deal with the consequences when the man actually meets his(n)

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Stephen Glass is a staff writer for the respected - current events and policy magazine - The New Republic, and a freelance feature writer for Rolling Stone Magazine and others. By the mid-90s, Glass' articles had turned him into one of the most sought-after young journalists in Washington D.C., but a bizarre chain of events suddenly stopped his careers path. Nominated for four Independent Spirit Awards and a Golden Globe(n)

programme.title: Life or Something like It
programme.desc: Stephen Herek's romantic comedy stars Angelina Jolie as Lanie Kerrigan, a New York-based television news reporter who anchors the morning show and is engaged to baseball star Cal Cooper, with whom she shares her flash lifestyle. Leaving aside her sparky working relationship with cameraman Pete, it all looks close to perfect to the outsider. But things take an abrupt about turn when she's sent to interview Prophet Jack, a sidewalk savant feted for his ability to predict football scores. He dutifully predicts the next day's results for her, as well as unseasonal weather, along with the unwelcome, unsettling news that she will die in a week's time. So far, so dismissible - until the scores come in, together with an unexpected hail storm, leaving Lanie with some serious thinking to do about what she wants from (her apparently foreshortened) life and her relationships..(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: Office worker Wesley learns not only that his dad was a lethal hitman, but also that he's inherited the same skills(n)

programme.title: By the Sea
programme.desc: In 1970s France, a former dancer and her writer husband take a cross-country journey to a small coastal town where they bond with its quirky but wise inhabitants(n)

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul (Ethan Hawke), headed to Mexico with his faithful collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. There, he brawls with a rowdy gang of misfits and finds himself exiled by the town marshal (John Travolta), which sparks a bloody quest for revenge. Karen Gillan and Taissa Farmiga co-star. Ti West wrote and directed this Western thriller(n)

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: In the nerve-shredding third installment of this horror series about a night when all crime is legal, an ex-cop who refused to murder his son's killer must now act as the head of security for a presidential candidate who wants to end "the Purge."(n)

programme.title: The Astronaut's Wife
programme.desc: Returning from a routine mission to repair a satellite, astronaut Spencer Armacost briefly loses radio contact with mission control. This time he's a centuries-old Chinese emperor (Jet Li) with a vast undead army. Michelle Yeoh, Jonathan Carnahan, Zi Juan(n)

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: Set in the Depression of the '30s in southern United States, this drama portrays the remarkable relationship established between Paul Edgecomb (Tom Hanks), a prison guard on Death Row, and John Coffey (Michael Clarke Duncan), a hefty colored man sentenced to death for a brutal double homicide. As the days go by, and after some surprising experiences, Edgecomb begins to have doubts about Coffey's culpability. He is a naïve, apprehensive man with a supernatural gift. Based on a novel by Stephen King, this drama received four Oscar nominations(n)

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Stephen Glass is a staff writer for the respected - current events and policy magazine - The New Republic, and a freelance feature writer for Rolling Stone Magazine and others. By the mid-90s, Glass' articles had turned him into one of the most sought-after young journalists in Washington D.C., but a bizarre chain of events suddenly stopped his careers path. programme.title: Life or Something like It
programme.desc: Stephen Herek's romantic comedy stars Angelina Jolie as Lanie Kerrigan, a New York-based television news reporter who anchors the morning show and is engaged to baseball star Cal Cooper, with whom she shares her flash lifestyle. Leaving aside her sparky working relationship with cameraman Pete, it all looks close to perfect to the outsider. But things take an abrupt about turn when she's sent to interview Prophet Jack, a sidewalk savant feted for his ability to predict football scores. He dutifully predicts the next day's results for her, as well as unseasonal weather, along with the unwelcome, unsettling news that she will die in a week's time. So far, so dismissible - until the scores come in, together with an unexpected hail storm, leaving Lanie with some serious thinking to do about what she wants from (her apparently foreshortened) life and her relationships..(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy is furious when she learns that Sheldon has shared intimate details of their relationship with his colleagues at the university, prompting their first fight since moving in together. Raj considers trying to live without financial support from his father, who thinks he is spoilt.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Cut off from his father's fortune, Raj struggles to balance his books, so decides to appoint Sheldon to organise his finances and get him out of debt. Penny considers joining the guys at Comic-Con because she thinks Leonard wants her to come along.(n)

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers
programme.desc: The artists meet Francesca, whose self-inflicted art-inspired tattoo is more disaster than old master, while Alice covers up Kieron's Dale Winton inking and Sketch gives Madison a sci-fi inspired memorial to her mum.(n)

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers
programme.desc: A self-professed mummy's boy asks Sketch to erase his misunderstood tattoo, while Jay sorts out martial arts fan Jimmy's naughty nod to Chuck Norris. Alice helps Olivia, who has epilepsy, to get a tattoo to mark her journey, and it is game over for Will's drinking game disaster.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Alex Zane presents a top 50 countdown of clips, including brushing teeth with fireworks, an unusual wrestling stunt and a vegan rap.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Alex Zane presents a selection of popular online videos on the theme of dumb and dangerous, featuring unwitting contributors to their own downfall and others who have hit the self-destruct button deliberately in the name of internet glory. The line-up includes Man v Cactus, Woman v Water and Girl v Bus Stop, plus a humorous hair tutorial.(n)

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos, plus interviews with the people who created them. This edition features a drumming washing machine and Spider-Man on a skateboard.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Russell's father visits New York and makes a surprise proposal. Jeff and Audrey come to regret their decision to allow Adam and Jennifer to share their bathroom for a week after the couple's water supply is turned off. Comedy, starring David Spade and Patrick Warburton.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Jennifer and Adam consider buying their apartment, and Audrey and Jeff offer to write a letter of recommendation - but their good deed backfires. Bianca Kajlich and Oliver Hudson star.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel disapproves of a boy Lennox has started dating, despite seeing `a bad boy' herself. Meanwhile, Joe takes it upon himself to tidy his employer's closet. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from the north Kent coast compete, with engaged Emma and Craig kicking things off with their menu of simple fare, but the starter isn't popular and there are issues with the dessert. Darren and Dan are next up and their food goes down a storm, while well-to-do Edward and Catherine conclude proceedings, hoping to impress with their grand house and fine dining. Who will take home the £1,000 prize money?.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In East Anglia, hip-hop enthusiasts Christine and Terry provide a hearty menu for their guests, before allotment owners Tim and Amanda host with a menu dedicated to their home-grown fruit and veg. Finally, Megan and Matt - who rarely spend time together in the kitchen - set off their fire alarm and have difficulty pulling things together and getting any food to the table.(n)

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Ollie invites an old friend to Binky and JP's baby shower, while Jamie and Frankie take time apart, and Ella is jealous of Olivia's close relationship with Julius.(n)

programme.title: Postman Pat: The Movie
programme.desc: The small-town postman enters a TV talent contest, and is soon tempted away from his simple life by the bright lights of celebrity. Meanwhile, a sinister corporation has plans for taking over his deliveries. Animated adventure, with the voices of Stephen Mangan, Rupert Grint, Jim Broadbent and David Tennant.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry and Erica forget to buy Beverly a Mother's Day gift and make last-minute `Mom Coupons' instead. Understandably hurt, Beverly gets her revenge by cashing in every coupon they have made in one go. Adam yearns to go to a summer camp for junior astronauts and accuses his father of crushing his dreams when he isn't keen to give permission.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry's favourite shirt is hated by both his mother Beverly and his girlfriend Lainey, so they hatch a plan together to destroy it. However, once the shirt goes missing, Barry asks Adam and Erica to investigate. Murray decides to tear down the family tree house, leaving Adam distraught.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam worries about being `hazed' by the older students when he goes to high school, but he soon earns their respect by body-slamming Barry. Erica and her friends talk about what they are going to put into their school-time capsule.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam works on a new persona that he hopes will make him seem cool on his first day at high school. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Lainey tries to set her father up with a `woman of interest' by using new video dating technology. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos on the themes of food and animals.(n)

programme.title: A Turtle's Tale: Sammy's Adventures
programme.desc: An elderly turtle encourages a group of newborn hatchlings to take their first journey out to sea with the story of his own youthful adventures, when he embarked on a daring 50-year search for the love of his life, braving the dangers of environmental pollution along the way. Animated adventure, with the voices of Dominic Cooper, Gemma Arterton and John Hurt.(n)

programme.title: Mr Popper's Penguins
programme.desc: A workaholic businessman always puts his job before his family until he receives an unexpected inheritance from his explorer father - six penguins. He abandons his plan to offload the birds to a zoo when he finds his kids love them, and sets about turning his New York apartment into a suitable habitat. Family comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Carla Gugino and Angela Lansbury.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon breaks up with Amy and turns to cats in his search for an alternative to human companionship. However, when he starts to bulk-buy pets, Leonard decides enough is enough and calls for reinforcements to help bring his friend back to his senses. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is infuriated when Priya uses her legal knowledge to find a loophole in the room-mate agreement - but his spirits are lifted by a night on the town with Amy, Penny and Bernadette. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj endures an anxious day as he worries that a space probe he helped design will not function properly, while Leonard and Sheldon agree to go clothes shopping with Penny and Amy. Comedy, starring Kunal Nayyar, Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon goes to great lengths to convince Amy that they should have a baby together after they successfully complete a scientific experiment using DNA samples from both of them.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon cannot contain his jealousy when he hears that his university colleague Bert has won a prestigious fellowship with an impressive grant. Elsewhere, Howard finds an old remote-controlled toy he made in the past, but the rest of the group do not seemed to be too impressed by it. Stephen Hawking guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon, Amy, Leonard and Penny try to divide their collective belongings into two separate households. Meanwhile, Raj and Stuart work to prove themselves indispensable.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy's attempts to celebrate her birthday with an intimate night at home are interrupted by the news that Bernadette has gone into labour. however, it transpires that Howard, Raj and Stuart may have rushed the expectant mother to the hospital too early, with Raj having difficulty keeping the gender of the unborn child a secret.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The comedy returns after its mid-season break. The gang hear all about one another's Christmas adventures, from Sheldon and Amy's terrible trip to Texas, to Howard and Bernadette's first days as parents.(n)

programme.title: Tower Heist
programme.desc: The manager of an apartment complex asks a Wall Street financier to manage pension funds for him and his friends, but the man pockets all the money instead. When he realises the fraudster is going to get away with the crime and the money will never be found, he enlists the help of a professional thief to steal it back. Crime comedy, with Ben Stiller, Eddie Murphy, Alan Alda, Tea Leoni, Casey Affleck and Matthew Broderick.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britain's most opinionated TV viewers reveal what they thought of Children in Need, Poirot, Fear of Flying: Caught on Camera and more. First broadcast in November 2013.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The couch-potato TV critics reveal what they think of Doctor Who, Countdown, George Clarke's Amazing Spaces and I'm a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!. First broadcast in November 2013.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: Horizon: What on Earth Is Wrong with Gravity?.
programme.desc: Physicist Dr Brian Cox tries to solve the centuries-old mystery of gravity. Unconventionally competing with Newton and Einstein, he starts in Texas, firing a laser at the moon, before moving on to a sat-nav in Denver and a Louisiana swamp. The real issues are in the area of quantum physics for, as he discovers, that is the science of absolutely everything.(n)

programme.title: Is Anybody Out There
programme.desc: A run-down of developments in the search for extraterrestrial intelligence, exploring the theory that life was `seeded' on Earth by asteroid impacts in the remote past, and speculating on the possibility of inhabited planets existing elsewhere in the universe. Nasa officials share their thoughts on whether Jupiter's moon Europa is capable of supporting micro-organisms, while more far-sighted scientists look beyond the solar system, stressing that space knows no boundaries - and neither do the possibilities it contains.(n)

programme.title: The Saturn V Story
programme.desc: Documentary following the `space race' of the 1960s, focusing on the USA's multi-billion dollar space program. Featuring Nasa footage, visual effects and interviews with Apollo scientists to construct a timeline of President Kennedy's 1961 pledge to put a man on the moon by the end of the decade, and the reality of 24 individuals successfully making the journey in the Saturn V rocket.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: Horizon: Solar Storms - The Threat to Planet Earth.
programme.desc: Scientists predict a fit of violent activity on the sun which will propel billions of tonnes of superheated gas and pulses of energy towards Earth. In 1989 one of these solar storms, which has the power to close down modern technology, cut off the power to the Canadian city of Quebec. Horizon meets the weathermen as they try to predict what is coming and organisations like the National Grid as they prepare for the cosmic tempest.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: Horizon: What on Earth Is Wrong with Gravity?.
programme.desc: Physicist Dr Brian Cox tries to solve the centuries-old mystery of gravity. programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: Horizon: The Trouble with Space Junk.
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the scale of the problem of debris in space, with Earth surrounded by hundreds of millions of items moving at 17,000 miles per hour. The International Space Station had to move three times in 2014 to avoid potentially lethal chunks of junk and the Horizon team reveals how the US government is investing $1 billion to track space debris, while companies around the world are developing ways to clear up the mess, from nets and robot arms to harpoons.(n)

programme.title: Shuttle Discovery's Last Mission
programme.desc: A look at the final mission of Nasa's now retired third operational orbiter the Space Shuttle Discovery, which has spent more time in space than any other similar craft, flying in excess of 148 million miles. The programme focuses on its journey to the Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum, a technically challenging and emotional experience.(n)

programme.title: I Spit on Your Grave 2
programme.desc: A young model survives a brutal gang rape in New York City, and seeks bloody vengeance on her attackers in this sequel to 2010's I Spit on Your Grave. Katie (Jemma Dellender) was a small town model with big city dreams when she arrived in the Big Apple determined to launch her career. Spotting a flyer that tempts her with a free photo shoot, Katie takes the number and makes the call. But when the cameras stop flashing, the nightmare begins. Abducted, tortured, raped, and left for dead, Katie should never have survived the atrocities committed against her. Yet she did, and now as her attackers gasp for their last precious breaths while staring into her cold vengeful eyes, they will finally know the true meaning of fear(n)

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Two middle-aged goof-offs become members of the same family when one's mother marries the other's father, and sparks soon start to fly between the contentious new step-siblings(n)

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: The Italian Stallion returns for a rematch with Apollo Creed, hoping, finally, to capture the heavyweight title. This time, even his girlfriend, Adrian, gives Rocky her blessing(n)

programme.title: Wayne's World
programme.desc: Mike Myers and Dana Carvey star as Wayne Campbell and Garth Agar, lifelong friends who present their own cult cable show, Wayne's World, from a basement. Such is their success, slimy TV executive Ben Oliver plans to buy their show and turn it into a product-placement special. And to complicate matters, both Wayne and Oliver have fallen for foxy singer Cassandra. Based on characters first seen on Saturday Night Live, Myers' script and Penelope Spheeris's direction created an unlikely comedy, in which the nerds inherited the earth and a host of catchphrases were born. Excellent(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Director Gore Verbinski and the crew set sail once again for this, the third chapter in the swashbuckling Pirates of the Caribbean trilogy. Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp) is hopelessly trapped in Davy Jones' locker after a harrowing encounter with the dreaded Kracken, and now Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) and Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) must align themselves with the nefarious Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) if they hold out any hope of saving their old friend from a fate worse than death. The East India Trading Company and its fearsome leader, Lord Cutler Beckett (Tom Hollander), have taken control of the ghostly Flying Dutchman and its captain, Davy Jones (Bill Nighy), and now the baleful Admiral Norrington (Jack Davenport) has taken the helm in a relentless bid to destroy every pirate ship in his path and bring the Age of Piracy to a violent close. Meanwhile, Will, Elizabeth, and Captain Barbossa navigate treacherous waters and face bitter betrayal as they set sail to gather the only army that can stand up to Beckett -- The Nine Lords of the Brethren Court. But Captain Jack Sparrow is one of the lords, and as long as he's stuck in Davy Jones' locker, Beckett and his nefarious armada are sure to emerge victorious. There's still hope, however, if the heroic team that includes Tia Dalma (Naomie Harris), Pintel (Lee Arenberg), and Ragetti (Mackenzie Crook) can reach exotic Singapore and convince vulpine pirate Sao Feng (Chow Yun-Fat) to provide them with charts and a ship. But even the powerful Brethren Court may need a bit of help from volatile sea goddess Calypso in order to weather the coming storm. With the entire future of the pirate way at stake, everyone will be forced to choose sides while drifting precariously to the edge of the earth for one final, spectacular battle(n)

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: A wild and star-studded parody of 'Star Wars', in which the fair Princess Vespa must be rescued from the malevolent clutches of arch-villain Lord Dark Helmet, giving rise to a series of heroic escapades(n)

programme.desc: A once promising young baseball player returns to the mainstage fifteen years later, in an attempt to restart his career after battling the demons of his past. But, it is the choices he makes with the women in his life that could lead to his downfall again(n)

Soon their dreams come true when one of their songs becomes a big hit, but the pressures of success bring the members of the band into conflict. Tom Hanks wrote, directed, and starred in this nostalgic drama(n)

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: When a Miami-mob loan shark is sent to LA to collect a debt from a producer of low-budget films, he pitches him an idea for a picture instead of breaking his legs. Pretty soon the shark finds himself in his element with criminal predators of the Hollywood variety. This clever adaptation of Elmore Leonard's novel features cameos from Harvey Keitel and Bette Midler, and a sparkling score from John Lurie(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's terrifying masterpiece about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. But when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant Great White, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again. Based on Peter Benchley's best-seller, three sequels and numerous imitators followed. Steven Spielberg(n)

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: After suffering a humiliating defeat at the hands of hungry young boxer Clubber Lang, Rocky is rejuvenated by his former rival Apollo Creed, who trains Rocky for a rematch against the fearsome mohawked rival, and helps him regain "the eye of the tiger."(n)

programme.title: Traitor
programme.desc: An undercover CIA agent within a terrorist cell is marked as a terrorist suspect by the FBI in Overture Films' upcoming thriller Traitor. Don Cheadle produces and stars in the film as the operative under Guy Pearce's investigation. Based on an idea by Steve Martin, the film is written and directed by Day After Tomorrow screenwriter Jeffrey Nachmanoff(n)

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: Following a cataclysmic world war, the leading world powers outlaw emotion, believing that doing so will reduce the chances of another conflict. Thought-police known as Clerics are sent to enforce the law and put offenders to death. When one Cleric accidentally misses a dose of the drug which suppresses his emotions, he begins to reconsider his role in the fight against expression(n)

programme.title: American Ninja 3: Blood Hunt
programme.desc: A martial-arts champ (David Bradley) tries to prevent germ warfare. Jackson: Steve James. Cobra: Marjoe Gortner. Chan: Michele Chan. Andreas: Yehuda Efroni(n)

programme.title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
programme.desc: A surreal crime drama told as only Jim Jarmusch could, Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai stars Forest Whitaker as Ghost Dog, a hit man living in an unidentified but run-down city in what license plates call "The Industrialized State." Known for his gift of being able to come and go without people noticing him, Ghost Dog is a self-taught samurai who is obsessed with order and his strict personal moral code, drawn from the philosophies of the Japanese warriors. As every samurai needs a leader to whom he swears loyalty, Ghost Dog has devoted himself the service of Louie (John Tormey), a low-level crime boss who once saved his life. When Louie's superiors decide he must be executed, Ghost Dog leaps into action, methodically wiping out his many enemies. Along with a dizzying series of stylized shoot-outs, Ghost Dog also features carrier pigeons, characters who read Rashomon, a French-speaking ice cream man, and a score by RZA from the top-selling hip-hop group Wu-Tang Clan, who have their own well-documented obsession with Asian culture. Ghost Dog was screened in competition at the 1999 Cannes Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: anusA Great White shark menaces an outdoor water park that employs the grown son of a small-town police-officer who helped kill a shark that had been threatening their home town(n)

For some the Cold War is over, but for an American army sergeant, things heat up when he is assigned to escort a military prisoner back from Germany to stand trial in the US. Once on home ground, the soldier finds he is being used as a pawn in a chilling Russian-American conspiracy plot. A political paranoia thriller from the director of 'The Fugitive'(n)

programme.title: Supercross
programme.desc: Charged performances by Steve Howey and Mike Vogel kick-start this high-octane thrill ride about driven motorcycle-racing brothers competing against each other on the professional circuit. K.C. Carlyle (Howey) lands a lucrative sponsorship with a factory team, but younger brother Trip (Vogel), the better rider, must make his way as an independent "privateer." Real-life motocross star Tyler Evans has a cameo as himself. Directed by Steve Boyum. Cameron Richardson, Sophia Bush, Robert Carradine(n)

programme.title: Titan A.E.
programme.desc: Animated sci-fi adventure about a group of humans searching for a secret space station following the destruction of Earth by a nefarious alien race. With the voices of Matt Damon and Drew Barrymore(n)

programme.title: Godzilla: Tokyo S.O.S.
programme.desc: Fifty years after he first attacked Tokyo, Godzilla is back on the rampage in this monster opus from Toho Studios. After numerous rounds of combat with Japan's most furious monsters, the robotic beast Mechagodzilla is in for some much needed repairs when a handful of sprites appear before the scientists putting the machine back in fighting shape. The enchanted ones warn the scientists that their actions could have grave consequences, but it isn't long before Godzilla, the most fearsome of all monsters, returns to the scene to prove his might once and for all. What's more, Godzilla is joined by Mothra for a reign of terror that threatens to devastate the island. With few alternatives, Japan's leaders pit the repaired Mechagodzilla against Godzilla and Mothra, but it quickly becomes unclear if the robot will obey its human creators or join forces with the flesh-and-blood monsters(n)

programme.desc: A Japanese scientist (Shin Takuma) creates a giant cyborg creature to do battle with the prehistoric beast. Yumiko Shaku. Directed by Masaaki Tezuka(n)

programme.title: Godzilla: Final Wars
programme.desc: Giant monsters are rampaging in cities across the globe, and as the Earth Defense Force struggles to find a way to defeat the malicious mutants, their only hope lies frozen in the Antarctic in Versus director Ryuhei Kitamura futuristic entry into the long-running kaiju series. In the near future, Earth is being decimated by monsters that have been mysteriously unleashed in every major city from New York to Sydney, and as the world population falls into a paralyzing state of panic, the Earth Defense Force must stage a daring initiative to save the human race. After a giant unidentified flying object suddenly appears and vaporizes the beasts in a matter of seconds, the relieved citizens of Earth are comforted to hear that the newly arrived alien race is seeking to make a peace treaty with humankind. All is not as it seems, however, and as the nefarious aliens reveal their true nature, it's up to Godzilla to take back the planet -- or die trying(n)

programme.title: Godzilla: Tokyo S.O.S.
programme.desc: Fifty years after he first attacked Tokyo, Godzilla is back on the rampage in this monster opus from Toho Studios. After numerous rounds of combat with Japan's most furious monsters, the robotic beast Mechagodzilla is in for some much needed repairs when a handful of sprites appear before the scientists putting the machine back in fighting shape. The enchanted ones warn the scientists that their actions could have grave consequences, but it isn't long before Godzilla, the most fearsome of all monsters, returns to the scene to prove his might once and for all. What's more, Godzilla is joined by Mothra for a reign of terror that threatens to devastate the island. With few alternatives, Japan's leaders pit the repaired Mechagodzilla against Godzilla and Mothra, but it quickly becomes unclear if the robot will obey its human creators or join forces with the flesh-and-blood monsters(n)

programme.title: Godzilla, Mothra and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack
programme.desc: After sandblasting away years of camp and bad scripts from the Gamera franchise to form a couple of tight-scripted, vastly entertaining flicks, Shusuke Kaneko gives the same treatment to the granddaddy of kaiju eiga characters: Godzilla. The film opens with Godzilla waking up from his underwater hideaway. Unseen since his 1954 attack on Tokyo, the monster is spotted by a Japanese submarine. Though government officials seem reluctant to confront the problem, Navy Admiral Tachibana (Ryudo Uzaki), who witnessed the rampage when he was a child, is more than a little alarmed. Meanwhile, Tachibana's daughter Yuri (Chiharu Niiyama), who works at a struggling TV station, is making a documentary in the mountains of Niigata Prefecture. One night, they experience a massive earthquake and that next morning they learn that a gang of motorcycle punks were crushed in a mountain tunnel and witnesses reportedly saw some sort of fire-breathing creature in the rubble. Later, a group of campers in southern Kagoshima prefecture are crushed by some Thing that crawled out of Lake Ikeda. Soon Japan is awash with monsters -- including Baradon, a monster that looks like a pug terrier with Mickey Mouse ears, and King Gidora, a three-headed beast with a lethal 50-meter tail -- busting up things north, south, east, and west(n)

Eventual champion Novak Djokovic ended the run of Great Britain's Aljaz Bedene at this stage last year with a dominant 6-2, 6-3, 6-3 victory. programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes Back to School.
programme.desc: Adrian is called in to investigate a suspicious death at a school, and works as a substitute teacher in a bid to discover the truth - but finds that academic life has changed since he was a boy. Guest starring Andrew McCarthy and David Rasche, with Tony Shalhoub.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: An architect is found dead at his mansion by a police officer who claims a ghost could have had some involvement in the murder. The team investigates conventional leads, while Jane concentrates on pursuing the supernatural angle, discovering there is rumoured to be treasure hidden in the building. Elsewhere, Rigsby confesses his true feelings to Grace. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker, Owain Yeoman and Amanda Righetti.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Bosco arrests Jane after discovering the bug in his office, leaving Cho and the other agents to investigate a murder case. They believe the victim was killed in a dispute over oil-rich land, and when they hand evidence over to Patrick he comes up with leads from the confines of his cell - before setting into motion an elaborate escape plan. Guest starring Ashley Jones (True Blood), with Simon Baker and Terry Kinney.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The vigilante crooks take time out from their hectic lives to share tales of glory from a time before they joined forces. As they compare notes, they begin to realise they each tried to steal the same rare artefact five years earlier - unaware they were competing against their future team-mates in the race to secure the item.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team discovers an antiquities trafficker working for Moreau is using refugee children as mules to smuggle artifacts, and travels to London to lure him into an auction house scam. While there, Sophie faces the consequences of her past actions. Guest starring James Frain (True Blood).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony is forced to tackle a case with a personal element when his father is discovered drunk in a car that has a dead body in the boot. The victim is revealed to be Navy lieutenant Dean Massey, who DiNozzo Sr had threatened to kill after being cut out of a land development deal. Guest starring Robert Wagner.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: US Navy captain Jake Marsden is murdered in his hotel room and inquiries lead to marine lieutenant Emma Reynolds - who tells the team she was the intended target. After being stationed in Kabul, she became pregnant by a local man called Amir who was later killed in action - and Abby discovers he was the sole male heir of a wealthy family that owns a large tract of land in a politically sensitive part of Afghanistan.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Bosco and Lisbon reluctantly team up to investigate the kidnapping of a woman from a wealthy family. They suspect her abductors could have been behind a previous case in which a man was murdered, prompting Jane to take an unorthodox approach to save the victim's life before the ransom is paid. Crime drama, starring Terry Kinney, Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and the team are shocked to discover serial killer Red John targeted the CBI headquarters while they were out on assignment, leaving two agents dead and seriously wounding Bosco. Jane soon uncovers a link to another case, which leads him to vital evidence in the investigation - and the discovery that the criminal had an accomplice in the office. Crime drama, starring Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The con-artists try to trick a bad-tempered hedge fund manager into believing he has killed Parker, as part of an elaborate scheme to get him to reveal critical information about Damian Moreau. Crime drama, starring Beth Riesgraf.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The con-artists take part in a festive-themed job, aiming to restore Father Chrismas's reputation by breaking into a mall and posing as St Nicholas himself. Eliot is forced to don the iconic red suit, while Hardison and Parker stand by as his assistants. However, the plot thickens when the team uncovers a nefarious scheme cooked up by an old rival. Guest starring Dave Foley and Wil Wheaton.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a Navy commander last seen in the company of a mysterious blonde woman, who turns out to be missing NCIS agent and Tony's ex-lover EJ Barrett. She identifies the murderer as Seal-turned-assassin Marcellus Dane, who is suspected of working for Casey Stratton - a member of black ops unit Phantom Eight. Guest starring Sarah Jane Morris.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An estate agent and two clients discover the body of Lt Com Maya Burris, a naval attache who had been working in Egypt, and her detective husband Nick arrives on the scene to demand answers. Using documents discovered on the victim's boat, Abby links her to Barry Norton, who is suspected of having sold government secrets to a Middle Eastern terrorist group known as the SRC.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine Sergeant is found dead in a national park, forcing Gibbs and his team to collaborate with Mounted Police Sergeant May Dawson to solve a string of related crimes.(n)

programme.title: Bull
