Thriller prequel to Kiss the Girls, starring Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker and Penelope Ann Miller.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy 2: Special
programme.desc: The making of the new sci-fi adventure sequel, which reunites the stars of the 2014 hit.(n)

programme.title: Anna and the King of Siam
programme.desc: A widowed English schoolteacher begins a relationship with the powerful monarch of Siam while tutoring his 67 children. Romantic drama, starring Irene Dunne, Rex Harrison and Lee J Cobb.(n)

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: A harassed publisher faces several unexpected set-backs on the way to his wedding - including a chance encounter with a vivacious woman, who only adds to his confusion as he begins to feel stirrings of love for her. Romantic comedy, starring Sandra Bullock, Ben Affleck, Maura Tierney, Steve Zahn, Blythe Danner and Ronny Cox.(n)

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: A rock singer who abandoned her family to pursue her dreams of stardom returns to her home town. She gets the chance to make amends for her past mistakes as she reconnects with her ex-husband, and helps her daughter to cope with a difficult time in her life. Comedy drama, starring Meryl Streep, Kevin Kline and Streep's real-life daughter Mamie Gummer.(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy sequel, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast.(n)

programme.title: Working Girl
programme.desc: Naive but ambitious secretary Tess discovers her conniving boss has been claiming credit for her ideas. She hatches a plan to get revenge and further her own career into the bargain, with a little help from the unscrupulous executive's boyfriend. Comedy, starring Melanie Griffith, Sigourney Weaver, Harrison Ford, Joan Cusack and Alec Baldwin.(n)

programme.title: Runaway Bride
programme.desc: A disreputable journalist hopes to get his ailing career back on track by writing an article about a commitment-shy woman famed for ditching bridegrooms at the altar - but complications arise when the pair meet on the eve of her latest attempt at marriage. Romantic comedy, starring Julia Roberts and Richard Gere, with Joan Cusack, Hector Elizondo and Rita Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: An aristocratic Englishwoman inherits a vast cattle station in the Australian Outback in the 1930s. When her land comes under threat from a rival farmer aiming to build a monopoly, she is forced to lead her herd across the wilderness to secure the farm's future, falling for a tough stock-man and forming a friendship with a half-Aboriginal boy along the way. However, as they make their journey, the country becomes drawn into the Second World War. Baz Luhrmann's romantic drama, starring Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman.(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Two expeditions set out to climb to the summit of the world's highest mountain. Both parties of mountaineers get caught in one of the fiercest snowstorms ever recorded, and face a desperate struggle to survive against the elements. Fact-based adventure, starring Jason Clarke, Josh Brolin, Jake Gyllenhaal and Keira Knightley.(n)

programme.title: Miracles From Heaven
programme.desc: A sick young girl with a rare illness finds herself cured after surviving a terrible accident. Drama, starring Jennifer Garner, Kylie Rogers and Martin Henderson.(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: A political lobbyist recovering from a painful break-up forms a passionate new relationship with a charming stranger. However, she begins to wonder whether she can trust her new boyfriend has his behaviour grows increasingly volatile - a situation that only gets worse when her ex resurfaces. Thriller, starring Sanaa Lathan and Michael Ealy.(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A US congressman gets embroiled in a secret mission to provide covert military support to rebels in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. Before long, he finds unlikely allies in the shape of a womanising CIA agent, a Texan socialite and the president of Pakistan. Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword - Behind the Scenes
programme.desc: Alex Zane visits the set of Guy Ritchie and Jude Law's epic action adventure to see what it takes to bring King Arthur to life.(n)

programme.title: Paradise, Hawaiian Style
programme.desc: A reckless singing pilot joins a friend in Hawaii, where they plan to go into business together running chartered helicopter flights. However, his irresponsible nature, tangled love life and dangerous flying threaten to ruin their enterprise. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, James Shigeta and Suzanna Leigh.(n)

programme.title: Definitely, Maybe
programme.desc: A New York advertising executive on the eve of his divorce tells his daughter about his love life before he was married, including how he met her mother. However, he changes the names of his former lovers, leaving the girl - and viewers - to guess which one of three women he ended up marrying. Romantic comedy, starring Ryan Reynolds, Abigail Breslin, Elizabeth Banks, Rachel Weisz and Isla Fisher.(n)

programme.title: Lessons in Love
programme.desc: A womanising professor settles down with his younger girlfriend and their son, only for her to leave him for someone else. Her sister visits him to make sure he is being a good father and has not slipped back into old habits, but ends up falling in love with him. Romantic comedy, starring Pierce Brosnan, Salma Hayek, Jessica Alba and Malcolm McDowell.(n)

programme.title: Music and Lyrics
programme.desc: A washed-up pop idol is given the chance to write a song for a teenage star - but despite his musical talents, he has never written a lyric in his life. However, the discovery that the woman who looks after his plants has a way with words marks the start of a beautiful relationship. Romantic comedy, starring Hugh Grant, Drew Barrymore, Brad Garret and Kristen Johnston.(n)

programme.title: Florence Foster Jenkins
programme.desc: A tone deaf socialite has dreams of becoming a singer, but problems arise when she decides to perform at Carnegie Hall. Fact-based comedy, starring Meryl Streep.(n)

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's biopic of the technology entrepreneur, exploring his life through three pivotal moments over the course of 14 years. Jobs is passionately driven to revolutionise computing technology, but his dreams come at a price, with a devastating impact on both is relationship with his family and his own health. Starring Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet and Seth Rogen.(n)

programme.title: Music and Lyrics
programme.desc: A washed-up pop idol is given the chance to write a song for a teenage star - but despite his musical talents, he has never written a lyric in his life. However, the discovery that the woman who looks after his plants has a way with words marks the start of a beautiful relationship. Romantic comedy, starring Hugh Grant, Drew Barrymore, Brad Garret and Kristen Johnston.(n)

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: A single mother desperate for work pleads her way into a routine administrative job at a law firm. It is not long before she stumbles across mislaid documents about a case brought against a corporation for poisoning the residents of a small town by contaminating their water supply. Realising something is amiss, she begins her own investigation. Fact-based drama, with Julia Roberts in an Oscar-winning role, alongside Albert Finney and Aaron Eckhart.(n)

programme.title: Florence Foster Jenkins
programme.desc: A tone deaf socialite has dreams of becoming a singer, but problems arise when she decides to perform at Carnegie Hall. Fact-based comedy, starring Meryl Streep.(n)

programme.title: Fathers and Daughters
programme.desc: A writer still recovering from the death of his wife struggles to retain custody of his daughter as he develops a serious illness. Years later, his daughter is now an adult and faces up to the personal issues brought about by her chaotic childhood as she begins a new relationship. Drama, starring Russell Crowe and Amanda Seyfried.(n)

programme.title: The Secret of Moonacre
programme.desc: When her father dies, 13-year-old Maria is sent to live with her eccentric uncle in Moonacre Manor. The youngster finds herself drawn into a magical conflict when she learns she is destined to become the last Moon Princess and is charged with unearthing secrets of the past to prevent the mystical kingdom disappearing forever. Fantasy adventure set in the 19th century, starring Dakota Blue Richards, Ioan Gruffudd and Tim Curry.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Three mismatched prehistoric animals join forces to return a human infant to its tribe - but as their journey unfolds, the creatures fail to anticipate the many perils and pitfalls that lay in store for them. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of John Leguizamo, Ray Romano, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic and Jack Black.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
programme.desc: Sid the sloth, Manny the mammoth and Diego the sabre-toothed tiger grimly realise the good life is about to come to an abrupt end as flood waters threaten their homes. However, a vulture suggests they could turn an old giant tree into a boat and make their escape, so the three friends set off in search of it. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Ray Romano, John Leguizamo and Denis Leary.(n)

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: A gifted youngster is packed off by her selfish parents to the prison-like Crunchem Hall School. Once there, she befriends a sweet-natured teacher who convinces her that not all grown-ups are bad - and urges her to use her special powers to turn the tables on the nasty headmistress. Fantasy comedy, adapted from the children's book by Roald Dahl, with Mara Wilson, Pam Ferris, Embeth Davidtz, Rhea Perlman and Danny DeVito, who also directed.(n)

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Outsider Red does not fit in among his island community, but he is the only one to smell a rat when a fleet of green pigs pitch up. Animation, with the voice of Jason Sudeikis.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Three mismatched prehistoric animals join forces to return a human infant to its tribe - but as their journey unfolds, the creatures fail to anticipate the many perils and pitfalls that lay in store for them. programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his town's weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan.(n)

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Outsider Red does not fit in among his island community, but he is the only one to smell a rat when a fleet of green pigs pitch up. Animation, with the voice of Jason Sudeikis.(n)

programme.title: The Big Green
programme.desc: An English teacher provides her American pupils with an introduction to the joys of soccer, giving them the pride and ability to take on the best at the state championships, and winning the heart of the local sheriff along the way. Sporting comedy, starring Steve Guttenberg, Olivia d'Abo and Jay O Sanders.(n)

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: The hapless hound and his chums reunite after a bitter break-up to solve a baffling mystery in the ghost-themed tourist resort of Spooky Island, whose owner is convinced he has a genuine haunting on his hands. Live-action comedy adventure based on the cartoon series, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr, Linda Cardellini and Rowan Atkinson.(n)

programme.title: Spooky Buddies
programme.desc: A gang of talking puppies explores a spooky mansion, where an evil wizard is up to no good. The daring dogs have to save the world from his villainous plot, and receive some unexpected help from a friendly ghost. Family adventure, starring Harland Williams and Dylan Sprayberry, with the voices of Frankie Jonas and G Hannelius.(n)

programme.title: The Big Green
programme.desc: An English teacher provides her American pupils with an introduction to the joys of soccer, giving them the pride and ability to take on the best at the state championships, and winning the heart of the local sheriff along the way. Sporting comedy, starring Steve Guttenberg, Olivia d'Abo and Jay O Sanders.(n)

programme.title: Survive the Serengeti: Against the Wild 2
programme.desc: When their plane crash-lands in the African bush, two bickering siblings find themselves force to rely on their wits - and their courageous dog - to help them conquer their fears and survive. Adventure, starring Jeri Ryan, John Paul Ruttan and Ella Ballentine.(n)

programme.title: The Land Before Time
programme.desc: A young brontosaurus is left alone when his mother dies, so goes off in search of a legendary valley, where food is plentiful and he will be safe. He acquires a group of new friends on his journey, who help each other to avoid predators and obstacles in their way. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Gabriel Damon and Pat Hingle.(n)

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: The living exhibits at New York's Museum of Natural History are shipped to Washington's Smithsonian Institution - along with the artefact that brought them to life in the first place. Nightwatchman Larry tries to retrieve it, only to find the contents of the world's largest museum have been reanimated, including a pharaoh determined to take over the world. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson and Steve Coogan.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his son's tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: The singing rodents mistakenly come to the conclusion that their human friend Dave intends to get rid of them when he proposes to his girlfriend in Miami. With only three days until Dave pops the question, the trio embark on a desperate road trip across America to sabotage his romantic plans. Family comedy sequel, starring Jason Lee and Kimberly Williams-Paisley.(n)

programme.title: Garfield: A Tale of Two Kitties
programme.desc: The lazy moggy stows away in his owner's luggage and ends up in London. He is promptly mistaken for an English upper-class cat, who has recently inherited a grand estate, and moves into his stately home - much to the dismay of the real aristocratic feline's conniving relation, who is bent on swindling him out of his money. Family comedy, starring Breckin Meyer, Billy Connolly and Jennifer Love Hewitt, with the voices of Bill Murray and Tim Curry.(n)

programme.title: Rabbit School: Guardians Of The Golden Egg
programme.desc: When the Easter rabbit school comes under threat from a family of foxes plotting to steal the legendary golden egg, it's up to young Max to save the day. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Noah Levi and Senta Berger.(n)

programme.title: Desierto
programme.desc: A group of immigrants hoping to make it across the US-Mexico border are targeted by a deranged, gun-wielding vigilante. Thriller, starring Gael Garcia Bernal and Jeffrey Dean Morgan.(n)

programme.title: Last Cab to Darwin
programme.desc: A terminally ill New South Wales taxi driver sets out on a cross-country road trip in a bid to die on his own terms. Australian drama, starring Michael Caton, Ningali Lawford and Mark Coles Smith.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: When a cosmic blunder leaves Earth in the path of an asteroid, it's up to Sid the sloth and pals Manny and Diego to save the day. Animated sequel, with the voices of Ray Romano, Denis Leary and John Leguizamo.(n)

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Premiere. When the commander of his old military unit is arrested on trumped-up spy charges, vigilante Jack Reacher investigates. Action sequel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders and Danika Yarosh.(n)

programme.title: Tale of Tales
programme.desc: This fantasy epic adapts three fairy tales by 17th century Neapolitan writer Giambattista Basile, each one focusing on the royalty in neighboring kingdoms. In one, a king (John C. Reilly) goes off to cut the heart out of a sea monster, which could be the key to curing his wife (Salma Hayek) of infertility; in another, a dim-witted ruler (Toby Jones) neglects his daughter's search for a husband as he becomes obsessed with a flea that grows to enormous size; in the last tale, an oversexed monarch (Vincent Cassel) is bewitched by an elderly woman with a beautiful singing voice. Directed by Matteo Garrone (Gomorrah)(n)

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: The story of James Braddock, a supposedly washed up boxer who came back to become a champion and an inspiration in the 1930s(n)

programme.title: House of D
programme.desc: An American artist living in Paris recalls growing up in 1970s Greenwich Village with his widowed mother(n)

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: The first teen to come out of the closet at North Gateway High struggles to balance his newfound popularity with his longtime friendships as the three most popular girls in school all attempt to claim him as their G.B.F. (gay best friend). The moment Tanner (Michael J. Willett) reveals his true sexuality to his classmates he rockets up the social ladder. Suddenly, he's decked out in the latest fashions, and living it up with the in-crowd. Meanwhile, the friends who used to be part of Tanner's inner circle get left out in the cold. Now Tanner will be faced with the most difficult decision of his high school career -- keep riding the popularity train and accept his role as a human fashion accessory, or go back to the people who have always accepted him for who he really is. Megan Mullally, Jonathan Silverman, Rebecca Gayheart, and Natasha Lyonne co-star in a comedy from director Darren Stein(n)

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: A young woman tries to find her biological mom in this ensemble comedy about Mother's Day. Elsewhere, a divorced mother of two falls for a guy with two kids of his own, and an overstressed mom is visited by her bickering parents(n)

programme.title: A Civil Action
programme.desc: The families of children who died sue two companies for dumping toxic waste: a case so expensive to prove it could bankrupt their lawyer(n)

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: Russell Crowe, Hank Azaria and Burt Reynolds head an impressive cast in this quirky comedy. An amateur hockey team in a small Alaskan town comes into national prominence when a former resident (Azaria) writes a praiseworthy article about the team. Now the villagers must deal with the town's newfound fame. Mary McCormack. Directed by Jay Roach(n)

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: (2007) Ethan and Joel Coen's Oscar-laden thriller stars Josh Brolin as Llewelyn Moss, a trailer-dwelling welder and hunter. Hunting deer in the desert, he comes across a drugs exchange which has gone bloodily wrong, and among the detritus is a case containing $2m. He decides to appropriate the money, but it's not a wise move: he soon has the deadly assassin Anton Chigurh (Javier Bardem) on his trail, as well as Sheriff Ed Tom Bell (Tommy Lee Jones), and smiling bounty hunter Carson Wells (Woody Harrelson). As Moss tries to keep hold of the cash, and preserve both his own life and that of his wife Carla (Kelly Macdonald), a deadly game of cat-and-mouse is played out across the Tex-Mex border, as pursuers and the pursued try to gain the upper hand. In English, and Spanish with English subtitles. M,W,S(n)

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: (2007) Ethan and Joel Coen's Oscar-laden thriller stars Josh Brolin as Llewelyn Moss, a trailer-dwelling welder and hunter. Hunting deer in the desert, he comes across a drugs exchange which has gone bloodily wrong, and among the detritus is a case containing $2m. He decides to appropriate the money, but it's not a wise move: he soon has the deadly assassin Anton Chigurh (Javier Bardem) on his trail, as well as Sheriff Ed Tom Bell (Tommy Lee Jones), and smiling bounty hunter Carson Wells (Woody Harrelson). As Moss tries to keep hold of the cash, and preserve both his own life and that of his wife Carla (Kelly Macdonald), a deadly game of cat-and-mouse is played out across the Tex-Mex border, as pursuers and the pursued try to gain the upper hand. In English, and Spanish with English subtitles. M,W,S(n)

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Creatures of the night find new prey on the scariest night of the year in this horror story. It's Halloween night, and four friends -- Allison (Vanessa Horneff), Elliott (Wil Horneff), Trevor (Karl Jacob), and Brian (Sean Reid) -- are on a road trip en route to a friend's wedding when their car breaks down after running into something. Looking for help, the four happen upon the farmhouse of an elderly couple, Elvin (Richard Little) and May (Barbara Wilhide), which is located next to a huge barn. Elvin and May have already become lost in the darkness of the barn, and soon two of the lost travelers are suffering the same fate as they search for friendly strangers. However, while they can barely see a hand in front of their face, they discover they're not alone in the barn, which has become home to a huge swarm of bloodthirsty bats. The Roost is framed by an introduction and postscript from a television horror show host, played by Tom Noonan(n)

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: A teenager living in a 1960's small town believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them. But a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare(n)

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: A power-crazed villain finds his mission to acquire a precious mythical artifact thwarted by a pair of young adventurers who are sworn to protect history's most prized treasures in this globe-trotting fantasy adventure. The stories of legend are true, and the magical relics owned by such celebrated figures as Cinderella really exist. The malevolent force known as The Krugen knows well that the owner of these objects will reap ultimate power, because by obtaining the magical mirror once owned by the Evil Queen who tormented Snow White, they were able to herald the arrival of the Dark Ages. Centuries later, former Hunter Mason has become a loyal servant of The Krugen. He knows that once he locates all of the pieces of the mirror no one will be able to challenge his evil reign. But Jordyn and Carter Flynn hail from a long line of Hunters, and they've got just the skills to prevent Mason from achieving his diabolical plan. When Jordyn and Carter learn that their parents have gone missing during an important mission, they vow to track them down, and head off a disaster that could alter the entire course of history(n)

programme.title: Arthur and the Invisibles
programme.desc: With knowing nods to "The Wizard of Oz" and "Honey, I Shrunk the Kids," this wondrous blend of live action and stunning computer-animation is a blast. To save the family farm, a youngster (Freddie Highmore) shrinks in size to enter a magical world of wood sprites and search for treasure. Mia Farrow. Directed by Luc Besson, who co-wrote the script, which was based on two of his own Arthur best sellers. Among the voice talent are Madonna, Robert De Niro, Jimmy Fallon, David Bowie and Snoop Dogg(n)

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons

programme.title: Darkness Falls

The story goes that she can't step into light, but if you wake up at night and see her, she will kill you. Twelve years after Kyle escaped the Tooth Fairy's clutches, he must return to Darkness Falls to face his fears(n)

programme.desc: Fans of the popular video game are rewarded with this thrilling adaptation, which follows a crack group of marines on a mission to Mars, where a genetic experiment has produced mutant monsters that are wreaking havoc on a scientific facility(n)

programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Jason is an American teenager obsessed with Hong Kong cinema and kung-fu classics. One day, he makes an extraordinary discovery in a Chinatown pawnshop -- he finds the legendary fighting stick of Chinese sage and warrior The Monkey King. With the stick in his hands, he is suddenly transported back to ancient China, where he joins an army of fierce warriors. Together, they'll embark in a dangerous quest to free the imprisoned king. Martial arts stars Jackie Chan and Jet Li come together onscreen for the first time ever(n)

programme.title: Reeker

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: A small band of friends make an uneasy alliance with a mysterious lone wolf in this blend of horror and adventure. An unnamed catastrophe has turned the Earth into a wasteland, and as packs of feral cannibals wander the countryside, a dwindling number of survivors struggle to stay alive. Rick (Dominic Monaghan), Adam (Shawn Ashmore), Henson (Cory Hardrict), and Shannon (Shannyn Sossamon) have been journeying together for months and are the last living members of a much larger group. Mary (Ashley Bell) is a solitary woman who crossed paths with the survivors and is now traveling with them. She isn't interested in discussing her past or becoming friends, but the others learn she's a powerful ally in a fight. The travelers take shelter in a house, but are soon surrounded by cannibals; they quickly realize just how strong a warrior Mary can be, while also discovering the terrible truth that led her to wander alone. The Day was directed by Douglas Aarniokoski, who has accumulated extensive credits as an assistant director and helming second-unit material on major films(n)

programme.title: The Ex
programme.desc: Acclaimed music-video director Jesse Peretz made his third feature with this comedy starring Zach Braff and Jason Bateman. Tom (Braff) is an aspiring chef whose wife Sofia (Amanda Peet) has just quit her high-paying job to stay home with their new baby. When it becomes abundantly clear that they can no longer maintain their New York City lifestyle, the family picks up and moves to Sofia's hometown in Ohio, where Tom is hired to work at her father's ad agency. It is there that Tom meets Chip (Bateman), the agency's wheelchair-bound golden boy, who also happened to have a one-night stand with Sofia while the two were cheerleaders in high school. Suddenly, Tom finds himself sabotaged by Chip at every step as the nefarious paraplegic schemes to steal Sofia from him and destroy any chance he might have of success at the agency. Released briefly in 2006 under the title Fast Track, the film was retitled The Ex before receiving a wide release in the Spring of 2007(n)

programme.title: Queer as Folk
programme.desc: Pilot. In the series premiere, Brian becomes a father after his lesbian-couple friends give birth. He also meets a young and loving 17-year-old who may curb his casual sex life(n)

programme.title: Queer as Folk
programme.desc: Queer, There and Everywhere. Brian's (Gale Harold) new baby is the topic of a conference call between Michael (Hal Sparks), Ted (Scott Lowell), and Emmett (Peter Paige). The three men are all chatting from their jobs, and Ted is simultaneously ogling some internet porn. He quickly puts down the phone when his boss walks into his office. Neither Ted nor Michael is out at work, and Michael even feels compelled to laugh when an obnoxious co-worker makes fun of gay customers. Justin (Randy Harrison) graphically describes his encounter with Brian to his schoolmate, Daphne (Makyla Smith). While Justin is telling Daphne he's in love, Brian is seducing a married man at a business meeting, leading to a quickie in the men's room. Michael, in an effort to conceal his sexual preference, encourages the interest of a pretty female co-worker, Tracy (Lindsey Connell). He's roped into socializing with a small group after work, and Emmett gives him a sports magazine to study, so he'll pass for straight. Brian gets into a tiff with Lindsay (Thea Gill) and Melanie (Michelle Clunie) because they want him to take out a one-million-dollar insurance policy to provide for Gus, their baby boy. That night, Justin comes looking for Brian, who avoids him. Michael feels responsible, and takes Justin to a diner, where he explains to the stricken teen that "Brian doesn't do boyfriends." They're waited on by a wise-cracking middle-aged waitress, Debbie (Sharon Gless of Cagney & Lacey fame), who turns out to be Michael's mom. Michael is in denial about his crush on Brian, but Justin picks up on it quickly. Justin drops in on Brian, interrupting another anonymous tryst. Brian gets over his annoyance long enough to tell Justin, "I don't believe in love."(n)

programme.title: Queer as Folk
programme.sub-title: No Brits, No Shirt, No Service
programme.desc: No Brits, No Shirt, No Service. Brian shows up late to his son's bris and nearly comes to blows with Melanie; Emmett thinks he's found love with a young Japanese man who speaks no English; and Ted finally gets picked up by a hunky blond(n)

programme.title: Queer as Folk
programme.desc: Ted's Not Dead. When Michael (Hal Sparks), Brian (Gale Harold), and Emmett (Peter Paige) go to visit Ted (Scott Lowell) in the hospital, they learn that he's in a coma and may not recover. Ted's mother, Mrs. Schmidt (Elva Mai Hooper), is understandably distraught to learn that her son was given drugs by a stranger he picked up, who then left him to die. Justin (Randy Harrison) shares detention with a football player he's attracted to, and ends up pleasuring the jock with his hand. Melanie (Michelle Clunie), who happens to be Ted's lawyer, shows up at Brian's office to tell him Ted has named him in a living will, and he's responsible for deciding whether Ted will stay on life support. Brian can't handle the responsibility, and gets into another heated exchange with Mel. Justin reacts badly when his mother (Sherry Miller) calmly confronts him about his sexual preference. Justin runs away and goes looking for Brian. Emmett and Michael go to Ted's apartment to remove all evidence of his lifestyle (e.g. dildos, porn) before Mrs. Schmidt shows up. At Ted's, they find a shrine to Michael. "He collects you the way you collect comics," Emmett points out. Brian goes to the hospital and curses out the comatose Ted before getting it on with an orderly in the next bed. Ted awakens from his coma just in time to hear them going at it. Brian goes to Debbie's (Sharon Gless) to relay the good news, where he finds Justin waiting for him(n)

programme.title: Queer as Folk
programme.desc: Now Approaching... The Line. Justin attends therapy with his mother; Brian "entertains" a client, who's a married man living a double life; Michael gets adjusted by a hunky chiropractor (Chris Potter). Justin: Randy Harrison. Brian: Gale Harold. Michael: Hal Sparks(n)

programme.title: Queer as Folk
programme.desc: The Art of Desperation. After his big date, Michael (Hal Sparks) is convinced that David (Chris Potter) doesn't like him. Brian (Gale Harold) convinces him to pay another visit to the chiropractor's office. Ted (Scott Lowell), determined to give up club life, finds a speed dating service called Date Bait for gay men over 30, and drags Emmett (Peter Paige) along for company. "I have no desire to have sex with any of them," says Emmett of the assembled men. "Neither do I," answers Ted, "That's a start." He ends up going out with Roger (Darrin Baker), a slightly chubby, bald musician. Michael goes out with David again, and this time, they spend the night together. Ted and Roger go out on a date, but they both seem more interested in the cute waiter than each other. Justin (Randy Harrison) befriends Lindsay (Thea Gill) and Melanie (Michelle Clunie), and after seeing his drawings (including a nude of Brian), Lindsay invites him to participate in an art show at the gay and lesbian center. Michael takes David to a club, and David explains he hasn't been out much because he was with his former boyfriend for six years before he died. Brian meets David, and makes a pass at him while Michael is getting them drinks. At the art show, Justin watches the door and waits for Brian to arrive. When Brian does show up, surprisingly, David suspiciously watches the way he is with Michael. David's jealousy is further aroused when Melanie drunkenly tells him that "Michael and Brian is the greatest love story never told," before she realizes who David is. Jennifer (Sherry Miller) also comes to the show and tries to conceal her shock at Justin's homoerotic work. Ted finally gets horny enough to have sex with Roger, but things don't go well(n)

programme.title: Queer as Folk
programme.desc: Smells Like Codependence. While Justin's mother continues adjusting to the idea that her son is gay, his father has a decidedly unpleasant reaction to the news. Meanwhile, Brian grows increasingly resentful of Michael's relationship. Justin: Randy Harrison. Brian: Gale Harold. Emmett: Peter Paige(n)

programme.title: Queer as Folk
programme.desc: Babylon Boomerang. Justin moves in with Brian after his father kicks him out of the house; Michael continues to deceive a lovesick fellow employee by going out on a date with her. Ted: Scott Lowell(n)

programme.title: Queer as Folk
programme.desc: Daddy Dearest (Sonny Boy). Emmett (Peter Paige) is becoming obsessive about cybersex, but his online persona is that of a muscular "top," so he can't meet any of the people he has sex with on his computer. When baby Gus comes down with a fever, Lindsay (Thea Gill) and Melanie (Michelle Clunie) rush him to the hospital, but Mel not being Gus' birth mother or his legal guardian, is not allowed into the emergency room. On top of that, she has a verbal altercation with a homophobic desk nurse. She wants to petition for second parent adoption, but first Brian (Gale Harold) has to relinquish his parental rights. Emmett is unnerved when he has visions of his hunky screen name, Pitts9x6 (Steve Boyle), coming to life and ordering him around, trying to make him more like his fantasy self. Michael (Hal Sparks) is nervous about a dinner party at David's (Chris Potter), and has the gang give him a crash course in table manners. It turns out to be an awkward affair, and only gets worse when Michael realizes, and announces, that one of the other guests once gave him an STD. Brian, after agreeing to give up parental rights to Gus, goes to visit his own father (Lawrence Dane), a broken-down drunk who doesn't know Brian is gay, and borrows money from his son. He says that Brian is just like him, and was never meant to settle down. The dinner party has Michael thinking that he and David are going to break up, but David has very different plans. This episode was directed by John Greyson (Zero Patience)(n)

programme.title: Queer as Folk
programme.desc: Queens of the Road. David (Chris Potter) wants Michael (Hal Sparks) to move in, and tells Michael about his domestic fantasies, but Michael's not ready to give him an answer. Lindsay (Thea Gill) decides that she doesn't want to go back to work when her maternity leave is up, sending Melanie (Michelle Clunie) scrambling for a way to make living on a single income financially feasible. Justin (Randy Harrison) goes home for his little sister's birthday party, and Jennifer (Sherry Miller) tries to get him to stay, but he knows his father won't accept who he is. Brian (Gale Harold) comes home to find that his apartment has been robbed because Justin failed to turn on his alarm system. He angrily throws Justin out. A cross-dressing psychic uses a Ouja board to tell Michael that Brian is his true love. Then Justin's friend, Daphne (Makyla Smith), shows up to tell the gang that Justin has run away to New York, and they soon learn that he's using Brian's credit card. Michael cancels his dinner plans with David, Lindsay, and Melanie to join Brian, Emmett (Peter Paige), and Ted (Scott Lowell) on a road trip to New York to track Justin down. Out on the road, Brian tells Michael that he'll miss being with him if he moves in with David. When they return to Pittsburgh, Justin moves in with Debbie (Sharon Gless), taking Michael's old room, and Michael gives David his answer(n)

programme.title: Queer as Folk
programme.desc: Surprise!. Emmett (Peter Paige) and Ted (Scott Lowell) are in a drugstore when Ted spots a guy he once had sex with. Then they overhear the man discussing his HIV medication with the pharmacist, sending Ted into a panic. The next day, Emmett and Ted go to get tested. Debbie (Sharon Gless) gives Michael (Hal Sparks) a hard time over his breakup with David (Chris Potter). She then goes to visit Brian (Gale Harold), telling him, "You've ruined my kid's life." Brian says he'll make it up by throwing a surprise birthday party for Michael's upcoming 30th birthday. He even invites David. Ted gets good news from the doctor's office, but Emmett gets a message telling him to come to the office first thing Monday, leaving him fearing the worst. At Michael's "surprise" birthday party, David's gift of an expensive watch can't compete with Brian having "Captain Astro" himself show up with a rare and valuable comic book for Michael. Ted chastises Brian, and tells him to let Michael go, and Brian petulantly tells Ted that everyone know he's in love with Michael. Emmett makes a pact with God, promising to give up sex with men in exchange for being HIV negative. The biggest surprise of the night comes when Tracy (Lindsey Connell) shows up at the party, and Brian outs Michael to her, sending a shocked and heartbroken Michael back into the arms of David(n)

programme.title: People Like Us

Reilly) goes off to cut the heart out of a sea monster, which could be the key to curing his wife (Salma Hayek) of infertility; in another, a dim-witted ruler (Toby Jones) neglects his daughter's search for a husband as he becomes obsessed with a flea that grows to enormous size; in the last tale, an oversexed monarch (Vincent Cassel) is bewitched by an elderly woman with a beautiful singing voice. Directed by Matteo Garrone (Gomorrah)(n)

programme.desc: Bullets fly and bodies drop in this sequel that finds Vietnam Veteran Frank Vega (Danny Trejo) training young boxers at an East L.A. community center. Despite doing his best to maintain a peaceful existence in a city overrun by crime, Frank is pulled back into the fray after his top student is murdered. Convinced that the killer still lurks in the city's criminal underbelly, Frank recruits his best friend Bernie (Danny Glover) that they're not too old to mete out a little vigilante justice. Unfortunately their quest for vengeance soon leads them to a powerful criminal who uses his diplomatic immunity to evade justice. Unfortunately for him, diplomatic immunity doesn't quite carry the same protection as a bullet proof vest, and before long Frank and Bernie have their slippery target running scared(n)

programme.title: Open Water 2: Adrift
programme.desc: A seafaring birthday celebration takes a turn for the terrifying when the passengers of a luxury yacht forget to lower the automated ladder before jumping into the ocean for a playful swim. It was a perfect setting for a relaxing weekend at sea, but sometimes even the best-planned trips can take an unexpected turn for the worst. After diving into the ocean and realizing to their horror that they have forgotten to lower the safety ladder, the friends who had set out for a simple weekend getaway realize that they have become helplessly stranded in the middle of the ocean. The sheer sides of the yacht are impossible to climb, and now the group is growing increasingly desperate. As the grim reality of their helpless situation slowly begins to dawn on the doomed friends, hydrophobic Amy (Susan May Pratt) struggles to maintain her composure after realizing that her baby daughter Sarah is helpless and alone aboard the boat. Now treading water as panic begins to set in, the once inseparable friends fast begin to turn on one another as exhaustion begins to set in and the vast ocean threatens to swallow the entire group without a trace(n)

As the writer uncovers facts that corroborate these suspicions, he begins to fear he might be killed, just like the man who worked on the memoirs before him. Directed by Roman Polanski. programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: The origins of the Caped Crusader of Gotham City are finally brought to the big screen in this new adaptation of the perennially popular comic-book series. As a child, Bruce Wayne (Christian Bale) lived a comfortable life as the son of wealthy parents, but the realities of life in crime-ridden Gotham City were brought home to him when his mother and father were murdered. Wayne pledged to bring justice and order back to the city and avenge the death of his parents, and one day he is approached by Henri Ducard (Liam Neeson), a teacher who guides him in the study of martial arts and the ways in which an ordinary man can become a champion. With the help of Ducard and gadget master Lucius Fox (Morgan Freeman), Wayne develops a secret identity as Batman, a masked fighter for justice who is determined to bring peace and safety back to Gotham. Batman Begins also features Michael Caine as faithful manservant Alfred Pennyworth, Gary Oldman as Lt. James Gordon, Katie Holmes as Wayne's sweetheart, Rachel Dawes, and Cillian Murphy as the villainous Scarecrow(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: With terrorist Bane determined to reduce Gotham to rubble, Batman must emerge from hiding to save the city. Action/thriller(n)

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: The origins of the Caped Crusader of Gotham City are finally brought to the big screen in this new adaptation of the perennially popular comic-book series. As a child, Bruce Wayne (Christian Bale) lived a comfortable life as the son of wealthy parents, but the realities of life in crime-ridden Gotham City were brought home to him when his mother and father were murdered. Wayne pledged to bring justice and order back to the city and avenge the death of his parents, and one day he is approached by Henri Ducard (Liam Neeson), a teacher who guides him in the study of martial arts and the ways in which an ordinary man can become a champion. With the help of Ducard and gadget master Lucius Fox (Morgan Freeman), Wayne develops a secret identity as Batman, a masked fighter for justice who is determined to bring peace and safety back to Gotham. Batman Begins also features Michael Caine as faithful manservant Alfred Pennyworth, Gary Oldman as Lt. James Gordon, Katie Holmes as Wayne's sweetheart, Rachel Dawes, and Cillian Murphy as the villainous Scarecrow(n)

programme.title: The Goonies
programme.desc: Old-fashioned yarn about a band of adventurous kids who take on the might of a property developing company which plans to destroy their home to build a country club. When the children discover an old pirate map in the attic, they follow it into an underground cavern in search of lost treasure. But the old pirate who had drawn the map planted plenty of dangerous obstacles along the way. From a story by Steven Spielberg(n)

programme.title: Bedtime Stories
programme.desc: When hotel handyman Skeeter Bronson begins babysitting his niece and nephew, together they devise wacky bedtime stories. After some strange events, he begins to believe that his stories are coming true and starts trying to use them to right the wrongs of long ago, but he then realises that it is only the madcap contributions of the children that become reality. Can he survive their imaginations? Starring Adam Sandler, Keri Russell, Russell Brand, Guy Pearce, Richard Griffiths, Teresa Palmer(n)

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Spectacular, screwball sci-fi comedy with Tommy Lee Jones and 'Fresh Prince' Will Smith about highly-skilled, secretive shady characters. They're the agents who regulate the aliens who have settled on Earth, and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace(n)

programme.title: Not Easily Broken
programme.desc: Director Bill Duke steps behind the camera for this adaptation of the T.D. Jakes novel concerning a newly married couple that finds their union threatened by pressures involving faith, family, and finances. As the couple exchanges their vows, the minister lays a cord around them while uttering the blessing, "a threefold cord is not easily broken." Later, during their darkest hour, the minister's advice to always keep God at the center of their marriage could be the only thing that keeps this troubled pair together(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: In 'Brooklyn's Finest', we're taken on a dark ride through the streets of Brooklyn, following three New York Police officers as they wrestle with temptation while attempting to uphold the law and deal with the pressures of the job. Eddie (Richard Gere) is a bitter and disillusioned veteran cop who's a week away from retirement. Tango (Don Cheadle) is an undercover narcotics cop who tries desperately to leave the streets and earn a promotion to a desk job. Much like Eddie, he's lost sight of his priorities and his loyalties seem to lie more with notorious inner-city drug dealer Caz (Wesley Snipes) than with the boys in blue. At the same time, narcotics detective Sal is a family man in despair and needs to raise money to buy a better house for his family. In seven days, the lives of all three officers will converge at one crime scene(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: Lemon Scented You. Trying to work things out with his dead and unfaithful wife, Shadow's reunion is interrupted when he and Mr. Wednesday are kidnapped by the New Gods(n)

programme.desc: A disillusioned Israeli counter-terrorist soldier fakes his own death in order to fulfil his dream of becoming a New York hairdresser, but his past soon catches up with him(n)

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Ashley Judd is the woman set up for her husband's murder. In jail, she survives by clinging to the knowledge that she cannot be tried for the same crime twice. Revenge on her husband may yet be possible(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
programme.desc: Carlos Saldanha's sequel to the incredibly successful original animation reunites the three unlikely friends, Manny the mammoth (voiced by Ray Romano), Sid the sloth and Diego the sabre-toothed tiger as they are forced to leave the safety of the valley, which is threatened by a melting glacier. But their trek to safety is complicated as Manny discovers a mate, Ellie, Diego confronts his fear of water and Sid is crowned the sacrificial king of a secret sloth society(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a young girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life in the Midwest and forced to move to San Francisco. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness each have their own ideas about how she should handle her new surroundings(n)

programme.desc: Fast-paced action and adventure as Gail, a whitewater rafting guide, and her family pick up two strangers on a rafting trip(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
programme.desc: In this thrilling continuation of the epic space opera, an ex-stormtrooper, a scrappy desert dweller and a droid companion embark on a journey that brings them face-to-face with heroes from the past, who are now battling a fascist regime called the First Order(n)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: Science fiction adventure in which a futuristic, militarised Earth is threatened by regiments of giant insects from outer space. When an idealistic teenager enlists in the army in order to become a citizen, he is put through a brutal training programme to prepare him for the horrors of war. Sent to the distant planet Klendaathu, he and his fellow troopers fight the deadly enemy force(n)

programme.title: Wolf Totem
programme.desc: In 1960s China, a student from Beijing is sent to teach a nomadic tribe in Mongolia. While there, he cares for and adopts a wolf cub, and their bond causes him to see the world in a new light(n)

programme.title: Postcards from the Edge
programme.desc: Postcards From The Edge is about a very real mother-daughter relationship set against the backdrop of a very surreal place - hollywood. The film follows Suzanne Vale (Merrill Streep), an actress who struggles to rebuild her life after a stint in a drug rehabilitation clinic following a near fatal overdose. Upon her release from rehab Suzanne is dismayed to learn that because of her history of drug use and the undependable track record that resulted, the only way she can be hired for a film she is anxious to do is if a "responsible party" agrees to house and supervise her for the duration of the movie's shooting schedule. For Suzanne this requires moving back into the Beverly Hills home of her mother, Doris Mann(n)

programme.title: Laurel Canyon
programme.desc: Drama in which freshly graduated psychiatrist Sam and his fiancée Alex move to a posh area in Los Angeles to live with Sam's free-spirited mother Jane, who is supposedly producing a record for her young boyfriend. While Sam is upset by his mother's drug habits and her rock 'n' roll life style, Alex is intrigued by Jane's sheer joie de vivre(n)

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: In this heartwarming comedy-drama set in the 1970s, a bipolar man promises his estranged wife that he will care for their two young daughters while she attends business school in New York(n)

programme.title: Down the Shore
programme.desc: When a downcast fairground attendant receives an unexpected visitor, the repercussions of the new arrival reverberate across his sleepy coastal town. Drama(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr. Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: There's murder, magic, mystery and romance afoot as writer-director Woody Allen heads to London for this beguiling and riotous whodunit. Allen is a magician who's recruited by an American journalism student (Scarlett Johansson) to help solve a crime after a ghost (Ian McShane) tells her that a British aristocrat (Hugh Jackman), with whom she may be falling in love, might actually be a murderer known as "The Tarot Card Killer." Charles Dance, Romola Garai, Julian Glover, Sam Friend(n)

programme.title: The Diary of a Teenage Girl
programme.desc: In this poignant adaptation of the acclaimed graphic novel, a precocious teenage girl living in 1970s San Francisco tries to understand the connection between sex and love after she seduces her bohemian mother's boyfriend(n)

programme.title: Saint Laurent
programme.desc: The life of designer Yves Saint Laurent is depicted in this biopic(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr. Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: . In the waning days of World War II, General Douglas MacArthur chose to make good on a pledge that he made in 1942 -- that he would return to the Philippines after he and his troops were forced to retreat. However, MacArthur's determination was more than a matter of pride. Over 500 American soldiers were being held in Cabanatuan, a notoriously brutal prisoner of war camp in the Philippines operated by the Japanese army, and MacArthur wanted to see to it that they made it home(n)

programme.title: The Son of No One
programme.desc: In this gritty thriller, a young cop (Channing Tatum) is assigned to the precinct in Queens where he grew up, and he finds his life threatened when he investigates a police cover-up involving the unsolved murders of two boys(n)

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement(n)

programme.title: Kinky Boots
programme.desc: In an attempt to save the family shoe factory from financial ruin, new boss Charlie creates a line of sexy footwear that's modelled by Simon, a vivacious cross-dresser with perfect feet. British comedy from the creator of Calendar Girls(n)

programme.title: Scenic Route
programme.desc: Two longtime friends who have grown apart struggle to survive after their pickup truck breaks down in the desert(n)

programme.title: Hysteria
programme.desc: Set in Victorian London, Tanya Wexler's period comedy Hysteria tells the tale of Mortimer Granville (Hugh Dancy), a young doctor disturbed by the way most hospitals ignore the latest research on germ theory, and still treat patients with bleedings and leeches. After being fired from his most recent job for speaking out on the matter, he ends up in the employ of Dr. Robert Dalrymple (Jonathan Pryce) who runs a private practice specializing in treating women who suffer from "hysteria" and come to the doctor for his precise digital manipulations in order to get a release. With the help of Mortimer's best friend Edmund (Rupert Everett) together they create a device that allows these women to achieve the desired result much more quickly. Complicating matters, Mortimer becomes enamored of Dalrymple's strong-willed, feminist-minded daughter Charlotte (Maggie Gyllenhaal). Hysteria played at the 2011 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Aloft
programme.desc: In this mystical and nonlinear drama, a mother reunites with her estranged son, whom she abandoned two decades earlier after a strange encounter with a faith healer(n)

programme.title: Seven Pounds
programme.desc: Will Smith stars in the emotional story of a man who changes the lives of seven strangers(n)

programme.desc: Quiet diplomat Justin searches for answers when his activist wife is murdered in Kenya. Rachel Weisz won an Oscar for her remarkable performance in John Le Carré's thrilling murder mystery(n)

programme.title: Fathers and Daughters
programme.desc: Jake raises his daughter Katie on his own after his wife died in a fatal car accident and he suffered a mental breakdown. He struggles with the daily routines he has to go through to make sure she lives happily. His relatives intend to take Katie away from him but Jake knows that he has to hold on to the one thing that he loves the most - his daughter(n)

programme.title: Seven Pounds
programme.desc: Will Smith stars in the emotional story of a man who changes the lives of seven strangers(n)

programme.title: Brick
programme.desc: A student investigates a mysterious death in this noirish crime thriller(n)

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: In this touching drama, a musician reeling from personal and professional disappointments moves into the Hamptons home of her father, a Sinatra-esque crooner still hoping to make a career comeback. In time, father and daughter bond while seeking success in the music industry(n)

programme.title: Hi-Life
programme.desc: Eric Stoltz stars in this comedy of errors as a man whose gambling debts lead to an ever-widening circle of lies. He enlists his girlfriend to help raise the money, and his fabricated sob story is so compelling that she creates her own lie to get money from her brother (Campbell Scott), owner of the Hi-Life bar, who in turn seeks help from various friends and an ex-lover. Moira Kelly, Daryl Hannah, Katrin Cartlidge(n)

programme.title: Operation: Endgame
programme.desc: A new recruit on a team of government assassins starts work the day the boss of the secret facility they are based at has been murdered. A second squad of killers is also operating out of the base, and both factions suspect the other - leading them to fight to the death(n)

programme.title: Uptown Girls
programme.desc: After losing her inheritance, a socialite works as a nanny to a precocious 8-year-old(n)

programme.title: The Hot Chick
programme.desc: A grungy criminal and a teen queen magically switch bodies(n)

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: An injured soldier returns home to spend Christmas with his family after serving overseas, also hoping to track down his lost love. He finds his siblings have problems of their own to cope with, while his mother is planning to divorce his secretive father(n)

programme.title: The Bronze
programme.desc: A former Olympic gymnast, still clinging to her fame as a bronze-medal winner, is forced to train an up-and-coming tumbler. However, she tries to sabotage the young athlete in order to preserve her own small-town celebrity(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in coexistence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teens must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

programme.title: Say It Isn't So
programme.desc: Gil falls for Jo, but it turns out she's his sister. With the Farrelly Brothers taking on romantic comedy, what did you expect? He's the orphan searching for his parents, she's the worst hairdresser in town. No sooner are they an item than a detective shows up and reveals that they share the same mum. It's all a big mistake, but can Gil win her back?(n)

programme.title: John Tucker Must Die
programme.desc: John Tucker is a high school basketball star dating three different girls at the same time: the activist vegan, the over-achieving blonde journalist, and the sassy cheerleading squad captain(n)

programme.title: The Bronze
programme.desc: A former Olympic gymnast, still clinging to her fame as a bronze-medal winner, is forced to train an up-and-coming tumbler. However, she tries to sabotage the young athlete in order to preserve her own small-town celebrity(n)

programme.title: Big Trouble
programme.desc: Humorist Dave Barry's comic novel is the basis for this frenetic romp, set in Miami. It's the story of a crazy group of people whose lives interconnect. Included: a Pulitzer Prize-winning columnist; a nasty industrialist; his put-upon wife; hit men; and a philosophical street person(n)

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: An injured soldier returns home to spend Christmas with his family after serving overseas, also hoping to track down his lost love. He finds his siblings have problems of their own to cope with, while his mother is planning to divorce his secretive father(n)

programme.title: John Tucker Must Die
programme.desc: John Tucker is a high school basketball star dating three different girls at the same time: the activist vegan, the over-achieving blonde journalist, and the sassy cheerleading squad captain(n)

programme.title: Fired Up!
programme.desc: The two most popular guys in high school decide to ditch their summer football camp for cheerleader camp. For the girls and for the glory(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: The work of international superstar Stephen Chow, Kung Fu Hustle is a humorous, special-effects-filled, action-packed martial arts epic set in early '40s China. A bumbling thief named Sing (Stephen Chow) desires to be the toughest member of the dreaded gangster hit squad known as The Axe Gang, but to completely join the gang he has to commit murder. When Sing attempts to rob a crowded run-down apartment complex known as Pig Sty Alley, the locals begin to defend themselves with some high-flying kung fu skills, and a tiny war erupts between the local masters and the axe-wielding gang. After the gang busts the ancient kung fu king known as The Beast (Leung Siu Lung) out of jail, tensions reach a boiling point as Pig Sty Alley's landlady (Yuen Qiu) leads an all-out attack against the gang and Sing discovers his true heroic fate. Kung Fu Hustle, which set box-office records across Asia during its December 2004 release, also stars Yuen Wah and Xing Yu, and features fight choreography by legendary masters of martial arts cinema Yuen Woo Ping and Sammo Hung(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in coexistence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teens must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

programme.title: Chasing Amy
programme.desc: Ben Affleck and Jason Lee are starting to make it as a comic strip creators but their friendship is threatened when Affleck falls head-over-heels for Joey Lauren Adams, who is gay. Kevin Smith, whose Clerks showed earlier, offers an engaging, amusing love story that carries an underlying seriousness about the pains of love(n)

programme.title: Love Is All You Need
programme.desc: A widowed Englishman working in Denmark and a Danish hairdresser who's been left by her husband forge a fragile romance during a trip to Italy to see their son and daughter get married. Philip (Pierce Brosnan) is a stern businessman who hates living in Denmark, and hasn't seen his son Patrick (Sebastian Jessen) in years. He's in a race to Patrick's wedding in Italy when he has a chance run-in with Ida (Trine Dyrholm) who's recovering from successful chemotherapy treatments when she learns that her husband Leif (Kim Bodnia) has been sleeping with a younger woman. Ida also happens to be the mother of Astrid (Molly Blixt Egelind), Patrick's beautiful bride-to-be. Though initially Philip and Ida appear to have nothing in common, their shared recognition that their children's union may be in trouble before the wedding bells have started to chime leads to an unexpected connection, and a second chance at happiness as they work to set things right. Directed by Susanne Bier (In a Better World, Serena)(n)

programme.title: Out to Sea
programme.desc: A pair of grumpy old men hit the high seas in this comedy. Small-time con man Charlie (Walter Matthau) fast-talks his considerably more straight-laced friend Herb (Jack Lemmon) into joining him for a luxury cruise on an ocean liner headed to the Bahamas. Charlie tells Herb that the trip is free and will be a good way to meet rich widows; both parts are true enough, but Herb doesn't know that Charlie has signed them on as dance hosts (hence the free tickets), and Herb isn't sure if he's ready for romance after the recent death of his wife. As the men struggle with the fact that Herb isn't much of a hoofer (and Charlie can't dance at all) under the strict tutelage of cruise director Godwyn (Brent Spiner), Charlie starts sweet-talking beautiful heiress Liz (Dyan Cannon), while Herb finds a soul mate in Vivian (Gloria DeHaven), who lost her husband not long ago. Out to Sea also stars Elaine Stritch, Hal Linden, Rue McClanahan, and Donald O'Connor, who pulled his dancing shoes out of mothballs for his role(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up with the Steins
programme.desc: The competition heats up as a young man on the cusp of adulthood in Brentwood, CA, prepares for his upcoming bar mitzvah, and his father strives to outdo the gargantuan coming-of-age bash recently thrown by his number-one nemesis, in a madcap tale of Hebrew rivalry from actor-turned-director Scott Marshall. Benjamin Fiedler (Daryl Sabara) is about to become a man, though the prospect of reciting a language he doesn't even really know in front of a temple full of strangers is so daunting that it makes him wish he could just stay a boy and write the whole thing off. As if his personal peccadilloes weren't enough to rack Benjamin's nerves, his father, Adam (Jeremy Piven), and mother, Joanne (Jami Gertz), are determined to send Benjamin into the adult world in true style. Recently, Adam's rival agent, Arnie Stein (Larry Miller), threw down the gauntlet for his own son's bar mitzvah by hosting a no-holds-barred bash that made New Year's Eve in Times Square look like cake-and-coffee day at the retirement community, and ultra-competitive Adam is determined to prove that he can top that now-legendary party. When Adam's aging, hippy-dippy father, Irwin (Garry Marshall), rolls into town in a broken-down RV with his dizzy young girlfriend, Sandy (Daryl Hannah), however, it appears as if all of his plans to out-class Arnie Stein may have been for naught(n)

programme.title: We'll Never Have Paris
programme.desc: A man second-guesses his plans to propose to his girlfriend after a pretty co-worker hits on him. When his girlfriend flees to Paris, he follows her in a last-ditch effort to salvage their relationship(n)

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: An ex-con receives a message from God that he must head to Pakistan and bring Osama bin Laden to justice. However, his bizarre journey draws the attention of U.S. forces stationed in the Middle East, who are baffled and annoyed by his vigilante quest(n)

programme.title: Only the Lonely
programme.desc: A sentimental comedy reminiscent of the 1955 Academy Award-winner Marty, Chris Columbus' Only the Lonely stars John Candy as Danny Muldoon, a Chicago cop who is pushing 40 and still living at home with his domineering mother Rose (Maureen O'Hara). When Danny falls for meek Theresa Luna (Ally Sheedy), Rose is aghast, forcing him to choose between his own happiness or his mother's(n)

programme.title: Big Trouble
programme.desc: Humorist Dave Barry's comic novel is the basis for this frenetic romp, set in Miami. It's the story of a crazy group of people whose lives interconnect. Included: a Pulitzer Prize-winning columnist; a nasty industrialist; his put-upon wife; hit men; and a philosophical street person(n)

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: A Mexican immigrant working as a maid for an affluent L.A. couple has to maintain control of her own daughter, who wants to assimilate(n)

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: An ex-con receives a message from God that he must head to Pakistan and bring Osama bin Laden to justice. However, his bizarre journey draws the attention of U.S. forces stationed in the Middle East, who are baffled and annoyed by his vigilante quest(n)

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: A black comedy about a frustrated puppeteer who gains access to John Malkovich's brain via a small portal in his office(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: The gang from Friday and Next Friday are back in this urban comedy, in which Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) have finally moved out of their respective parents' homes and gotten an apartment together. However, a bogus neighborhood Santa Claus (Rickey Smiley) decides to help Craig and Day-Day share the wealth by robbing their apartment, and when he rips off their stereo, he also makes off with their rent money, which was hidden in the speaker cabinets. Desperate to make rent and have some money for Christmas presents, Craig and Day-Day land jobs at a local strip mall, where their fathers, Mr. Jones (John Witherspoon) and Uncle Elroy (Don "D.C." Curry), have gone into business together running a barbecue joint. Craig and Day-Day are installed as security guards, and while Craig tries to make time with Donna (K.D. Aubert), a saleswoman at the Pimp N' Ho's Boutique, and keep things orderly at Holy Moly's Doughnut Shop, Day-Day attempts to transform himself into a master of crime-fighting, which causes a lot more problems than it solves. Friday After Next is the first feature film from director Marcus Raboy, who previously directed music videos for Sting, Li'l Kim, Staind, and Friday After Next star Ice Cube(n)

programme.title: Backstage
programme.desc: In 1998, rapper Jay-Z's third album, Vol. 2: Hard Knock Life made him one of hip-hop's biggest crossover acts, with the single "Hard Knock Life" becoming a major hit on radio and the sales charts. In 1999, Jay-Z, who also runs the hip-hop oriented Rock-A-Fella Records label, launched a major concert tour, in which he joined forces with fellow rappers Method Man, DMX, and Redman for a road trip that packed halls at 54 shows in two months, earning $18 million at the turnstiles. This documentary takes a close look at the music Jay-Z and his friends created onstage, as well as their adventures -- both positive and negative -- as they take one of rap's biggest shows on the road. Hard Knock Life Tour also features new music from The Lox, Memphis Bleek, and T-Boz from the R&B group TLC. Incidentally, if the title sounds a bit familiar to non-rap fans, it may be because it was sampled from a song featured in the musical Annie(n)

programme.title: Go
programme.desc: Doug Liman (Swingers) takes seemingly disparate stories and, in a cult film favourably compared to Pulp Fiction, interleaves them to a coherent finale. Sarah Polley (The Claim) is an LA checkout girl who arranges to pick up drugs for Scott Wolf and Jay Mohr for a little rent money, little knowing they're working for undercover cop William Fichtner (Pearl Harbor, Black Hawk Down). Meanwhile, in Las Vegas, her work colleague Desmond Askew is in trouble with the owners of a topless bar(n)

programme.title: The Way of the Gun
programme.desc: Christopher McQuarrie's (writer of The Usual Suspects) directorial debut stars Benicio Del Toro and Ryan Phillippe as a couple of small time crooks who decide to kidnap and ransom Juliette Lewis, surrogate mother of wealthy Scott Wilson. They figure he'll pay big but what they don't know are his connections which includes veteran 'cleaner' (James Caan), who knows all about finding and dealing with 'problems'(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: All a young girl wants for Christmas is a husband for her divorced mother, so she dumps the problem into the lap of a department-store Santa, who decides to handle the matter personally(n)

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: A professional thief tries to recover a prized ring taken from him by a ruthless millionaire(n)

programme.title: Drop Zone
programme.desc: Skydiving ace Ty Moncrief lands on federal buildings and steals files containing the names of undercover agents which he sells to drug barons. Pete Nessip is the marshal who takes to the air to bring him down(n)

programme.title: Homer & Eddie
programme.desc: James Belushi stars as Homer and Whoopi Goldberg is Eddie in this road movie from director Andrei Konchalovsky. Homer is a retarded man trying to reunite with his dying father; Eddie is a former mental patient, dying of brain cancer, who accompanies him on the journey(n)

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: Golden Globe nominated superstar, Beyoncé, stars in this seductive thriller. A successful asset manager, who has just received a Movie:huge promotion, is blissfully happy in his career and in his marriage. But when a temp worker starts stalking him, all the things he's worked so hard for are placed in jeopardy. Starring Beyoncé Knowles & Idris Elba(n)

programme.title: The Premonition
programme.desc: Burt Reynolds stars in this sequel to Hard Time as detective Logan McQueen, a man falsely convicted of robbery and murder who shares a cell with a man named Winston who has information about a series of recent bombings. The police eventually come to Winston for help with their investigation but he agrees to assist them only under the circumstances that they allow Winston's daughter Janice to visit him, and that they enlist Logan to work with them on their investigation. The police commence with the investigation but find that keeping up their end of the bargain might be dangerous, because Janice is their prime suspect(n)

programme.title: Backstage
programme.desc: In 1998, rapper Jay-Z's third album, Vol. 2: Hard Knock Life made him one of hip-hop's biggest crossover acts, with the single "Hard Knock Life" becoming a major hit on radio and the sales charts. In 1999, Jay-Z, who also runs the hip-hop oriented Rock-A-Fella Records label, launched a major concert tour, in which he joined forces with fellow rappers Method Man, DMX, and Redman for a road trip that packed halls at 54 shows in two months, earning $18 million at the turnstiles. programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas stars as an LA private eye on the hunt for a missing girl and the diamonds she's disappeared with. Neo-noir thriller from the producer of Mulholland Drive(n)

programme.title: Tales From the Hood
programme.desc: In this anthology of inner-city horror stories, a mortician shares grisly tales about his "patrons" when a group of crooks show up at his funeral home looking for a stash of drugs(n)

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: Nick Cannon stars in this comedy thriller as a 24-year-old police detective who takes no small amount of ribbing from his fellow officers for his boyish looks. His appearance, however, lands him a plumb assignment at a posh private high school, where he discovers the students are operating an underground business stealing and selling luxury cars. The Underclassman also stars Cheech Marin, Roselyn Sanchez, and Kelly Hu(n)

programme.title: Sprung
programme.desc: Love turns into a battle of the sexes in this comedy starring Tisha Campbell and Paula Jai Parker. Best friends Adina (Parker) and Brandy (Campbell) start to grow apart when Brandy falls in love. So Adina devises a scheme to break up the two lovebirds. Rusty Cundieff, Joe Torry, Clarence Williams III(n)

programme.title: Dysfunctional Friends
programme.desc: Years after graduating college and going their separate ways, nine former friends reunite at the funeral of a quirky, wealthy acquaintance, and learn that they are all eligible for a big inheritance if they can just spend five days together at his former estate. Meanwhile, as the clock starts ticking, what first seemed like a lighthearted reunion quickly turns sour as old wounds are reopened, and lingering grudges are resurrected. Now if anyone leaves, everyone sacrifices their portion of the estate. And as the hours stretch into days, the prospect of being trapped in a mansion with people who know their deepest, darkest secrets grows increasingly unbearable for all involved. Christian Keyes, Stacy Kiebler, Stacey Dash, and Terrell Owens star(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is at his best in this comedy-drama about a sports agent who falls from the top of his profession. Jerry Maguire is a key agent at Sports Management International, with a string of high-profile clients, a stunning girlfriend called Avery (Kelly Preston) and all the friends he could want. But Jerry wants something else - a more caring spirit within his company. After setting out his ideas in a mission statement, Jerry finds himself unceremoniously fired, and everything he has worked so hard to achieve suddenly disappears. Fortunately, he is able to take with him one member of staff - single mother Dorothy Boyd (Renee Zellweger) - and one reluctant client, Rod Tidwell (Cuba Gooding, Jr). Armed with nothing but his charm, his good looks and the ability to sell just about anything to just about anyone, Jerry begins the long fight back to the top(n)

programme.title: Half of a Yellow Sun
programme.desc: Based on Nigerian author Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie's novel, set during the Nigerian-Biafran War(n)

programme.title: Senseless
programme.desc: A college student overwhelmed with debt agrees to be a guinea pig for the science department, unaware that the chemical he ingests heightens his five senses to unheard-of proportions. Marlon Wayans, David Spade, Matthew Lillard, Brad Dourif, Tamara Taylor, Rip Torn, Richard McGonagle, Esther Scott, Ken Lerner, Kenya Moore, Ernie Lively(n)

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Callie Khouri's comedy crime caper stars Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah and Katie Holmes as Bridget Cardigan, Nina Brewster and Jackie Truman, three women employed as janitors at the Kansas City Federal Reserve Bank. Bridget has only taken the job because her high-earning husband Don has been downsized and somebody has to earn the money to keep up their lifestyle. It breaks her heart to see the old bank notes being sent for shredding - surely nobody will miss a few. Enlisting the other two, they find a 'foolproof' way of helping themselves to just a little. And when they go undiscovered, it's tempting for a little to become a lot - but only if no one suspects three such lowly female workers..(n)

programme.title: What Dreams May Come
programme.desc: Los ganadores del premio Oscar Robin Williams y Cuba Gooding Jr., estelarizan en esta metafísica historia sobre la vida y lo que hay después de la muerte. Williams da vida a Chris Nielson, un hombre felizmente casado que está de luto por la muerte acciden(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is at his best in this comedy-drama about a sports agent who falls from the top of his profession. Jerry Maguire is a key agent at Sports Management International, with a string of high-profile clients, a stunning girlfriend called Avery (Kelly Preston) and all the friends he could want. But Jerry wants something else - a more caring spirit within his company. After setting out his ideas in a mission statement, Jerry finds himself unceremoniously fired, and everything he has worked so hard to achieve suddenly disappears. Fortunately, he is able to take with him one member of staff - single mother Dorothy Boyd (Renee Zellweger) - and one reluctant client, Rod Tidwell (Cuba Gooding, Jr). Armed with nothing but his charm, his good looks and the ability to sell just about anything to just about anyone, Jerry begins the long fight back to the top(n)

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: Nick Cannon stars in this comedy thriller as a 24-year-old police detective who takes no small amount of ribbing from his fellow officers for his boyish looks. His appearance, however, lands him a plumb assignment at a posh private high school, where he discovers the students are operating an underground business stealing and selling luxury cars. The Underclassman also stars Cheech Marin, Roselyn Sanchez, and Kelly Hu(n)

programme.title: Mad Money
